Fantastic meal for our family.
Exceeded expectations.
Beautiful variety and taste sensations.
Amazing value.
Stuffed eggplant and prawns were great.

My very first 5 star review in Da Nang. Finally I found the perfect place!

I ordered the eggplant with shrimp.. Amazing. …

Fantastic family run place that has a great innovative menu that will leave you wanting more. I had the lemongrass and cinnamon juice (lush!) and the caramelised pork with boiled egg and steamed rice. I will be back to try some of the other dishes on the menu!
The restaurant has a great atmosphere and serves authentic traditional Vietnamese cuisine.

Easy to eat home-style dishes. I have been here with friends a few times and everyone is satisfied. The only downside that needs to be improved is the chipped bowls. The nostalgic style does not mean that most of the bowls on the table are chipped, it takes a long time to find a satisfactory bowl. The restaurant owner and manager should buy Japanese or Bat Trang ceramic bowls to replace the chipped ones the restaurant is using. Hopefully next time I come back I won't have to choose from 6 bowls on the table to find one that is not chipped.

Every time I come to Da Nang I eat here 👍🏻✨
I confirm this is authentic traditional Vietnamese food, like a Northerner …

It was close to my hotel so I stopped by.
I was not feeling well and could only pay a little attention, but I was wondering if I needed rice? I was asked this many times, but since I had ordered fried rice, I answered no.
But in the end, I forgot about the fried rice and couldn't eat it.
The stir-fried water spinach was delicious with the hint of garlic, and I think it was good for recovering from the hot and humid weather.
I was so happy that I was able to forget about the fried rice because I was full from just the water spinach.

There have been many cases in Vietnam where ordered items have not arrived, so please be sure to check your receipt when paying.
It was okay ordered a chicken curry but I think there was pork or frog meat mixed with chicken 😬
The place has character, but the food is average at best.
Amazing tradicional vietnames food, great value for money

Eggplant is a distinctly personal ingredient, but for me, it was perfect with rice, and the fried spring rolls were simply delicious.
The discrepancy between the menu prices and what I paid was confusing, but at around 25,000 Korean won for rice and three beers, it's a bargain.
The atmosphere is like eating at home. The food is similar to Thai food (the rice is like in Thailand).
Xin Chao~ A Vietnamese home-style restaurant with locals. The interior is beautiful and everything is delicious. The only problem is that the beer ice isn't cubed, so it melts really quickly!
they were playing some jitterbug or jive dance music that ruined the quiet relaxing ambience. just awful
We had a great dinner!
Amazing place, highly recommend. Everything was delicious, fast, and the atmosphere was great.
I ordered four options on the menu and none of them were available, which is quite rare. Although it is a home-cooked dish, it tastes good.

Got the braised eggplants and the fried pork belly. Eggplants were quite undercooked, the pork was good. What really upset me is that they charged me for rice that I didn’t ordered (they brought it and I thought it was included in one of the dishes I ordered).
The food here is quite delicious. The space is nice and cool. The lemongrass juice (or something similar because I can't remember) here is also quite delicious.
The service and food are very delicious, please experience the Bephen restaurant and take home a meal

Delicious food, enthusiastic and cheerful staff, lovely restaurant space
Cool and airy
The service and food are very delicious, please experience the Bephen restaurant and take home a meal
It is worth experiencing home-cooked meals, bringing the familiar feeling of a hard-working mother to family meals.

Nicely decorated but it is actually overrated. The food is ok, you can get better food with better price all over Danang. Caramelized pork is salty and still hard, not tender at all. Service is not bad but nothing to mention other than they seemed pretty pissed and the a/c on the second floor wasn’t cool at all, but the food do came out very quickly. Overall pretty disappointing.
The food is not worth the money!
Extremely expensive, not worth the money, and the food is also sketchy, not tasty. Do not recommend this restaurant.
Great and humble place for gathering and dine in, everything was really good and staff was friendly as well,  will definitely return for more next time!
Using some simple and natural foods to make a memorable meal is a satisfying and  healthy experience.  Other than that the nostalgic decoration is amazing and full of surprises.
Quaint little place that serves really tasty Vietnamese food. Rice is nice and fluffy. Stir fried pork belly is super flavourful. Will come back to try their other dishes.
Ordered caramelised pork belly, stir fried morning glory, fried spring rolls with shrimp, garlic fried rice, egg with minced meat and had a sumptuous meal. The food was great, highly recommended!
Simple, good. A perfect combination between a nice place and delicious local food.

Ordered chicken stew, morning glory, and rice
Chicken stew - chewy and chewy? No problem with soy sauce base
Morning glory - lots of stems and a little bland
There is air conditioning but they don't turn it on, the atmosphere of the store is good, but there are a lot of plants at the entrance so there seem to be some bugs (ants)
Great food and atmosphere.
Fried shrimp good, tea leave sea bass decent, pork ribs a little tough.
Good food

Definitely best restaurant in Da Nang after 2 weeks of eating out. Most authentic food which was really delicious. The atmosphere is very good with beautiful furnitures, plants and details and chill music. Feels like traveling back to a different Vietnamese era. I strongly suggest visiting it!
It's simple Vietnamese food. It's delicious. And it's cheap! All of this and four bottles of beer came to about 5,000 yen.

Delicious food. Had the fried rice- lots of garlic!
Spring rolls had a lovely flavour. Fast service
The interior is very well designed and the shop is very nice!!
very nice food ! 😉

A restaurant recommended by our books.
However, I was quite disappointed with the dishes, especially the shrimp spring rolls, some of which were completely empty.

Came to eat at 17.00, the shop opened just in time, no other tables were booked.
The food came quickly.
The taste was very good, as delicious as the reviews.
There was chili sauce, delicious and spicy, suitable for Thai people.
Very good service, recommended.
Nice food. Service is excellent!

Compared to other Vietnamese restaurants, the selection of food here is more delicious for foreigners. The staff are friendly and the atmosphere of the restaurant is retro and relaxing. However, I felt there was some room for improvement in terms of hygiene.
A really great restaurant, very nicely decorated.

I got there at 2:05pm they close a 3pm for break. I was given the menu with the pictures of food (yay) the service was guick & the food came out right away and looked exactly like the pictures. The fried pork with lemongrass & garlic was delicious. I also enjoyed the sauteed morning glory with garlic.

Great restaurant, the menu is extensive... but the food is very good!!!

We would have loved to come back to try other dishes!!

This has to be one of the best restaurants I have ever eaten in. Form the aubergine stuffed with pork, spring rolls, chilli chicken to the morning glory the entire meal could not be faulted. I am truly impressed with the food in this restaurant.
The food was absolutely amazing.
Really delicious & affordable food, nice atmosphere, great staff! 100% recommend

Had lunch here yesterday with a Vietnamese friend it was so good we are back tonight for dinner. The best stuffed eggplant 🍆 😋 everything was exceptional, fresh, and tasty.  Lovely original restaurant homey with nice music playing while you eat . Highly recommend.  The staff are friendly happy and helpful 😊.  Will return on future visits.

A small, common-style restaurant in a French-style building. The food is a little on the strong side for Vietnamese food, so it goes well with rice. It was my first time trying fried frog! If you don't know, it sounds like chicken.
Highly recommended if you visit Da Nang! Delicious food, with variety and quality. I wish I had this restaurant in my city :)
a must try in danang, one of the best food in danang

I was told by the grab driver to come here to eat.
The shop looks decorated in a very vintage and nostalgic style, it looks quite nice..
The food is delicious, comes out quickly, and has just the right flavor.
I'm quite satisfied! 😊
A great find. Lovelly restaurant with quaint olde worlde decor and atmosphere. Highly recommend the specials. Go there, you won't be disappointed.
lovely atmosphere and very homely food for a very good price. I had their sweet and sour which was heart-warming and authentic
The lemongrass and chilli tofu was amazing. Delicious food in a cute building, the best food I've had in Vietnam so far (as a vegetarian)

Had a very enjoyable and relaxing lunch in this homely restaurant.  They serve home-cooked Vietnamese style dishes which tasted good.

We had stuffed eggplant with mince pork, stir-fried morning glory with garlic, Vietnamese Spring Roll with shrimp and pork, and stir-fried chicken with lemongrass and chilli.

Ambience is nice, and decorated with artefacts.  Nice experience for overseas visitors.

Absolutely loved Bep Hen, only in Da Nang for one night and I'm so glad we came here. Nice relaxed place, especially compared to along the river, with great food. Had the chicken with spicy fish sauce, pork with lemongrass and chilli, rice and beer. Perfect amount of food for two of us and super tasty.

Nice and delicious local food😋😋😋
I recommend if your are tourist. All food is good testy. Normal price
~~||~~
But one thing not ok is all plate, spoon not clean and oily🤢 and ice melt in the glass when served.

First time visiting Da Nang to experience the typical dishes here and was very impressed with the delicious food. nostalgic space. Enthusiastic service staff. Clean and the seats are quite comfortable. Small car parking space. The price is high compared to a family meal but overall it is very reasonable. Suitable for introducing to foreign friends or receiving guests.

Outstanding authentic home cooked dishes. Pork stuffed eggplant with dark, rich sauce was superb. Succulent chicken stir-fried in a tangy fish sauce was crispy, not oily. Fresh, light, winter melon soup with ground pork warm and comforting. Atmosphere was quiet and inviting, very small, loaded with antiques and memorabilia. 3 courses with rice and beer for two, less than US$ 15.00 Unbeatable. One of our favorites in DaNang.

Bep Hen is one of my go to places -- I come here several times a week every week
It's a nice family run business and the food is very consistent

I almost always get fried pork belly with lemongrass and chili, rice and a lemongrass and cinnamon drink
Give this place a chance, I'm sure you'll love it

Such a kind owner. We came with our family and had to rush out with our young girls. She helped to pack everything up so we can enjoy ơi meal later. Wonderful, simple, comfort food in such an eclectic family home ambiance.

Lovingly furnished restaurant with friendly, attentive staff who have impressed me several times with very good cuisine and reasonable prices.
Great 👍

The atmosphere is good, there are many exquisite furnishings, the green facade is very special, the home-cooked food is delicious, the fried spring rolls are a bit too burnt, lemongrass fried tofu and bamboo shoots boiled chicken, the stir-fried vegetables are also fresh👍😊
Small portions. Price is higher than other restaurants in the area. Food quality is below average.
absolutely delicious.  only recommended.  everything was great!  gladly again you can only give 5 stars here 😍😍😍😍 thank you very much best food in Da Nang! …
At Bep Hen you find authentic, Vietnamese, home-cooked style food in a gloriously decorated space with an eclectic mix of artefacts. …
Morning glory, lemongrass shrimp, ice tea. A perfect lunch. Don't think, just come here. You won't regret it.
Good 👍 …
Local appetite, good price
It's like being in someone's home and eating their cooking! Cute decor and good food.
It was so delicious that I wished we had come with a large group and eaten more! I'd like to come again during my stay.
The house is like a museum, very interesting place with good vietnamese food.
The restaurant deserves its rating. Everything was delicious. We also got served promptly despite the fact that the place was full.
Beautiful, quiet

I think it's the best local food. The eggplant dish was also delicious. It's worth stopping by at least once.

The interior is also nice.
The bathroom is quite old.

Fried Pork Belly is so delicious
If you like lemongrass, I highly recommend it
The price is reasonable and the food comes out quickly

The food is overall salty and sweet
Add some plain rice and eat it
I recommend chopping up some chili and adding it to the food

food was okay.
but we found hair our 2 meals of 4, so don’t recommend

The atmosphere is good, the food is not all good. The frogs are tasty, the spring rolls are greasy in excess oil and fried, almost burnt. The third dish was too greasy and almost without gravy. The service is good.

The food here was incredible - and distinct from the any other traditional Vietnamese restaurant I’ve tried so far. I stopped by for lunch and got the braised caramelized pork with egg and some rice (as recommended by my waiter) - it was deliciously rich.
Recommended if you want to eat local food! Stir-fried eggplant? afforestation! Shrimp roll! Highly recommended!

In general, the frontage is too small, you won't see the restaurant, the food is delicious, the mackerel soup, the fish is too old, not delicious at all. 
The braised ribs are too dry, 
In general, it's okie, but in Da Nang there is no shortage of fresh and delicious mackerel, the price is not cheap, please choose the fish a bit.
This is the most delicious place I had while traveling in Da Nang! Haha It suits Korean tastes perfectly! It's also close to places to see such as Han Market and Yongdari Bridge! Highly recommended!
Edible but too expensive
We had lots of good food in Danang and this is yet the best meal. Great food, service, atmosphere and location

I enjoyed the braised eggplant and braised pork.
I recommend eating it with white rice rather than fried rice.
Because it's a little salty.

The food here has changed so much.

It seems like the owner has changed, and there are no customers. I hate hearing people complain about every dish... I'm leaving this post in the hopes that no one will waste their time and money like me.

Even though there were no customers, five dishes arrived in less than three minutes. Fast service isn't the restaurant's selling point; they all tasted bad.

The braised eggplant wasn't seasoned at all, and the braised pork was overcooked, salty, and tough. Just thinking about it makes me sigh.

I felt bad about wasting all that food, but I knew I'd regret it even more if I finished it, so I just got up and left. I want to commend myself for that.

If you still feel like eating, order one or at least a small portion first, then try it before you decide.
Come eat
Great food.
This is one of the best local restaurants where you can taste local Vietnamese home cooking.

My first time in Vietnam was a huge success. The pork here was always so bad because it had a strong gamey smell, but the pork I had here didn't smell at all and tasted like braised short ribs, so it was delicious. Everything I ordered was delicious, and the steamed rice portion was so huge that two people should only order one, lol.
Place full of energy and spectacular food!!

I had high expectations, and the food was delicious and generously portioned. The lemongrass and cinnamon juice was wonderful! The rustic and unique atmosphere was great. Unfortunately, the service was a bit disappointing, except for the …
Delicious Vietnamese food in a rustic atmosphere. The best part was the seating on the small balcony.
Lovely little place with excellent decor & wonderful food! Would definitely go again!

The atmosphere is definitely one of the best amongst homecook restaurants in Danang. Apparently the best seat of the place, the only one on that's on the balcony, requires early bookings for some busy nights, but we didn't mind any other …
Bep Hen in Da Nang serves up authentic local flavors with generous portions. A true taste of tradition, it’s a feast for the senses and the appetite.
One of our favourite restaurants in Da Nang. So good!
best!!

If you like genuine local home-cooked Vietnamese food, this is a great restaurant. They serve family style meals, so each dish serves 2 or more.
The staff forgot a few of our dishes, all our drinks, and brought the wrong food …
I tried Vietnamese home cooking before going to the airport and I really liked it!! I wish I had known about it sooner..

The restaurant was so pretty, and I was so hungry that I went in just after 10 o'clock. I rented the entire place and ate there all by myself. I was worried it might be hot, so they turned on a fan right in front of me, and they were so kind.
The menu included both regular options and photos, so it wasn't difficult. When I was having trouble deciding what to order, they even offered recommendations with their fingers. I ordered morning glory and rice (it's not on the photo menu, but the regular menu says steamed rice for 15,000 won or something), and chicken with lemongrass and chili peppers. The amount of rice was really... served in a soup bowl. One order would be perfect for two people. It wasn't sticky rice, but rather rice that was soft and fluffy, so it was delicious (personal preference).
I was a little worried because I'd seen a few reviews saying the food was salty, but it was perfect for my taste, so I had a blast. I couldn't tell if the table had a teacup or a plate, so I just placed the chicken bones on top of my rice and ate them. The waiter kindly placed a bowl in front of me and told me to put the bones in it. Thank you. We were both a bit embarrassed. I laughed..
Make sure to try the morning glory
I really enjoyed the food. Revisit!

Feel like home eating
Warm and delicious
We love it
Very good restaurant in Da Nang and the place is lovely ! I recommend !
ALL the food is so nice. We finished our meal around 6.30pm and there were a group of locals. Jasmine flower bud is very crunchy, I recommend to try it.

I went to the night market and wasted money because I couldn't eat the food due to the price and freshness, but I came here and had a really filling meal. 

I added rice to the pork soy sauce egg stew, stir-fried morning glory, stir-fried cumin pork?, and seaweed soup, and it was delicious. Be sure to try the pork soy sauce egg stew! The portion is also bigger than other places. Be sure to add rice. 
There is no separate meal menu, it's a side dish concept!
Super tasty food, great menu and very cozy atmosphere.
Good food, great atmosphere 👌
Very nice atmosphere with great vegetarian and vegan options: I'd recommend the stir fried eggplant with spring onions, flower buds with garlic and fried tofu with lemongrass and chili 🥹💚
Very good food for a decent price. Didn't blow my mind though but still 5 stars

I visited twice during my 5-day stay in Da Nang.
The staff were efficient and helpful, including things like a fan and ice for drinks.
All the dishes were really delicious and the white rice went on and on! I definitely want to visit again and will recommend it to my friends!
Visited after seeing reviews saying it was delicious! The taste was good...but too salty!! The amount of rice is so large that it can feed 3 people. However, all the food is very seasoned...

I went there after seeing Blogger and the location was good.
However, be sure to check the number of dishes and the price when paying. The food is too salty and hard to be fresh.
I added one more, looked at the menu, pointed, and counted again.
When I was counting the money, I deducted 10,000 dong and asked for it back, so I apologized and said I was mistaken. I think this is a store that caters to tourists. be careful. I felt so bad.

Nice atmosphere, and the meal was nice and distinct from the regular Vietnamese food we had throughout our vacation.

Portions are similarly generous.

Although the food is ordinary to good the prices are somewhat costly (especially when compared to the Michelin-starred restaurants we visited in Hanoi). Therefore it would rather give three than four stars.
I went with my family and the food was so delicious. It's a shame I didn't take any pictures because I was too busy eating.
Stir-fried Tien Li and stir-fried tofu were so delicious! I want to come again!
Local food

Food very average, number 1 rule, if no locals don't eat there. It isn't  that good, the place hyped up by tourists, first time eating there. They used old lettuce, splash water on to make it look fresh, I was there at 9 am, food wasn't fresh, looks like left overs from the weekend. Not recommended.
Delicious food, enthusiastic and cheerful staff. Quiet and chill space
The restaurant has a vintage atmosphere with lots of greenery, and there seems to be seating on the second floor. The staff are very friendly, and the food is excellent value for money.

A famous restaurant in Da Nang, serving home-cooked Vietnamese food that feels like eating at home, but the taste is beyond amazing. We ordered fried eggs, chicken with vegetables in tomato sauce + pineapple, and some kind of soup, but it was delicious and not expensive. The staff at the restaurant spoke English and gave great recommendations. 🫶🏻

I went there right after it opened at 9am and ate, but the air conditioning wasn't on. But it was bearable! I'm leaving a review so I can come back again~ The antique interior is crazy and the food is delicious!!!! I recommend the food on the mom-made menu!!!

The layout is very atmospheric, but the food is very ordinary and the price is on the high side in Da Nang.
And the air conditioner and fan will only be turned on when there are guests.
Most of the guests dining on the second floor turned off the air conditioner after they were full...
If you feel like there is no air conditioning, just go to the ordinary roadside stall next door.
Like at home
A green air-condition ed escape from the heat with a interesting decor

The food is so good... The spring rolls are really delicious. Amazing. The pork dishes are also delicious, and everything you see in the photos is delicious. This is my third time staying at the Fivitel Hotel.

The interior is well-designed and the food is delicious.
If you're having trouble deciding what to order, just point to the photo and you'll be fine!
Amazing food, place and staff! Try the roasted chicken!! As well as stir fried tofu with beef and mushroom! Great ones!

The atmosphere was great, and the food was Vietnamese, not just visually appealing, but also suited to Japanese tastes. The staff were also very attentive and helpful. I came alone, but since the leftovers were Vietnamese, I was happy to be able to take them home. I'll reheat them in my room tomorrow morning and enjoy them. It's a restaurant I'd like to visit again.
It's the best, zero failure rate👍
It was delicious. It's a great restaurant to visit at least once when you're tired of pho or other local foods.
I often stop by here whenever I miss my mother's cooking.
Very yummy!

This was my second trip to Vietnam. Of all the food I had in Vietnam, this was the most delicious. It was simply perfect for my taste, rivaling any decent Korean restaurant. I especially loved the braised pork and egg, and my companions loved the egg pancake-like dish. The atmosphere was unique, and I highly recommend it. It was delicious.

Bếp Hên Restaurant, a Vietnamese traditional rice meal haven, left a lasting impression on both myself and my Japanese friends during their visit to Danang. As I invited them to experience the authentic flavors of Vietnamese cuisine, Bếp Hên did not disappoint.

From the moment we stepped in, the warm and welcoming ambiance of the restaurant set the tone for a delightful dining experience. The thoughtful decoration and design exuded an air of traditional charm, immersing us in the rich cultural heritage of Vietnam.

As our meals were served, the tantalizing aromas wafting from the dishes heightened our anticipation. The traditional rice meal offerings were a delightful medley of flavors, textures, and vibrant colors. Each dish was a culinary masterpiece, skillfully prepared to preserve the authentic taste of Vietnamese cuisine.

My Japanese friends, experiencing their first real traditional Vietnamese rice meal, were captivated by the unique blend of tastes and textures. They couldn't help but indulge in the delectable array of dishes, leading to empty plates and full hearts. Their compliments on the food echoed my sentiments about the culinary excellence of Bếp Hên.

In conclusion, Bếp Hên Restaurant provided an unforgettable dining experience that introduced my Japanese friends to the beauty of Vietnamese cuisine. The delicious food, combined with the touching decoration and design, made our time at the restaurant truly memorable. Whether you're a local or a traveler seeking a taste of authentic Vietnamese flavors, Bếp Hên is a must-visit destination that promises to leave a lasting impression on your palate and your heart.

I'd put this down as a must visit when in Danang.
Unique and a true hidden treasure. Food was simple but deliciously so, with home cooked flavors, cooked with love.
You'll be missing out if you don't visit.
Typical Vietnamese restaurant

It is a taste that is not unfamiliar to Koreans either.
Good~^^
Beautiful architecture, quiet space, enthusiastic staff. Delicious food and extremely reasonable prices.
It has a great local feel and each dish is delicious.
This is a place that spreads happy vibes with good music and courteous staff. The food portioning was large. A restaurant with two levels, this Vietnamese place is highly recommended from my end.
The most delicious local food in Da Nang... A restaurant I experienced during my two-week trip.
The staff and owner are all friendly. The restaurant has a great atmosphere. The food is, needless to say, delicious. It seems to be a popular restaurant for locals due to its affordable prices.
Just loved it here. The staff were so smiley and welcoming and the food was delicious. Been twice and would go back again.

I went there because I heard it was a local restaurant, and the taste was good. We only ordered one cola, but at the last check, they wanted to charge us for two drinks. It was nice that he was really kind and spoke English, but when I asked him why there were two at the last check, he just said something in local. Be sure to check your receipt when paying.
Very tasty and one of the waiter speaks perfect English so it was very helpful! I would 100% recommend getting the sweet potato leaves !

Amazing authentic Vietnamese food at an incredibly affordable price - food was so good I had to come back again and their service was really quick

Would recommend the roasted pork, chicken and spring rolls!

Super super beautiful space, nostalgic, cozy but polite, suitable for families. Quiet, soft music, has speakers. The staff is very attentive and takes care extremely well. The food is reasonably priced and not overpriced. The braised pork and spring rolls here are very delicious.

Are you okay with those who ate there on July 23rd and August 24th? My friend and I had diarrhea and vomited after lunch that evening, and we almost died. We were sick for two days. We went there last year and it was so delicious that we went back again. I guess you have to go to a large, famous restaurant or a Korean restaurant to feel confident.
Clean ancient space
Yummy local food
The taste is not that great, but it suits the taste of Koreans, and the service and atmosphere are all satisfactory.
Delicious food, not too expensive, air conditioning for a cool lunch that makes the meal more delicious

Amazing little restaurant recommended to us by a Vietnamese friend. The food was amazing, it was my father's favourite food in the whole of Vietnam. Staff were very friendly, atmosphere was great. We ordered the caramelised pork with egg, an eggplant dish, and garlic morning glory vegetables. Price was great too! Recommend this restaurant for sure.

Nestled in an old quarter of Danang, this place has a charming atmosphere evoking a previous era in the city's history. Oh yeah, and the food is great. We had the eggplant, pork with shrimp paste, and sweet potato sprouts. All different and full of delicate flavours. There are lots of great places to eat in Danang - this one is right up there.
Good Vietnamese food and decent service. Also the restaurant decor is very eclectic in a good way. The only negative is the amount of dust caked on everything.

Legit home-cooked feel food, no disappointment meal. Living up to expectation.
Go for the eggplant w minced pork, fried tofu w lemongrass & chilli, and caramelised pork belly w egg. So good, we enjoyed ourselves so much. Level 1 has aircon, level 2 is only fans (not that). Overall, clean, retro-feel vibes. Also, hidden amongst thick greenery, but just at the corner of the street. Keep your eyes peeled! Good job Bep Hen!
Fantastic restaurant. Delicious food. Quirky atmosphere. Love it.

Excellent food. Visited twice with my family during our trip to Danang. Different dishes each time but they’re all good. Love it when a lady told us that the gourd was too old to stir fry and suggested an alternative dish that was excellent. Also love that they serve beer bottles while most serve beer cans only. I just wish they serve Saigon Special in bottles.
A bit more expensive than the local restaurants but well worth its price.

Good composition, good taste. It seems like a restaurant frequented by many locals. But it has captured the taste of Koreans, so it is definitely a good restaurant. The pork was quite tough. But it was still really delicious.
After a long time coming back to eat, the restaurant still maintains the quality of the food is very delicious, very worth experiencing when coming to Da Nang
Best food I had in Vietnam so far! It is a simple place, but it has a comfortable and authentic atmosphere.

First of all, I have to say that the space is extremely rustic, like an old house in the past, with many trees so it is quite airy. There are also quite a few tourists here, mostly Koreans.
The food is delicious, everyone.
The price is reasonable, not too cheap and not too expensive.
The service is very enthusiastic, especially in this hot weather, when entering the restaurant, they immediately bring a big glass of iced tea, it is really refreshing.
Support the restaurant with 5 stars, wish the restaurant more and more good luck in business.
Top delicious home-cooked meal restaurant in Da Nang. There are many dishes, good prices, located in the city center. The space is beautiful but a bit small.

If you have special dietary restrictions, such as food allergies or vegetarians who cannot eat onions and garlic, you should pay special attention. The waiter was unable to communicate your needs to the chef. We had confirmed with the waiter many times in advance, but he still sent out problematic meals and the store was unwilling to re-prepare them.

We had such a wonderful dinner here. We ordered chicken Caesar salad, flamingo four types of meat, wagyu burger, and some drinks. The food was really good, especially the lamb chop and pork rib! The staffs are really welcoming and friendly. My son mentioned they even smiled when our food were served. We were surprised they decorated the place and we get a yummy birthday cake! We appreciate Tune and the staffs, thank you for making such a memorable night for our son's birthday celebration! 🥰🥰

A fantastic place for a celebration! We celebrated International Women’s Day here, and everything was just perfect. The menu was great—diverse, delicious, and beautifully presented. The cocktails were especially impressive—so well-made and really tasty.

A lovely surprise was the small but very beautiful bouquet I received as a gift. It was such a thoughtful touch! The staff was extremely polite and attentive, always checking if we were happy with everything. The atmosphere was amazing too—an elegantly decorated hall, pleasant music, and an overall cozy vibe.

Everything was top-notch—the food, the desserts, and the service. We had a wonderful experience and will definitely come back!

Best food me and my family had in da nang by a country mile! Don’t let the outside appearance of the building put you off, it’s a bit underwhelming but the food and ambiance are top notch! Special thanks to Tuni, exceptional hostess!

Good service. Food very nice.
Downsides are the entrance of the hotel and swimming pool have ash trays and smokers present.

Sky View Restaurant exceeded expectations! The dishes were flavorful and fresh, and the ambiance was perfect for a relaxing evening. Our waitress, Lily, was attentive and friendly, making the experience even more enjoyable. Will definitely come back!
The waiter Kay is absolutely helpful. He introduced some signature dishes to us. It’s a nice dining experience here.
The view from the windows is stunning! Food is delicious, service is very good, portions are big. Recommend!

Such a lovely spot in Da Nang! 💖 The city view was amazing, the food was tasty, and the staff were super friendly. They set up the cutest birthday decorations with candles, roses, and balloons. It felt really special. Definitely a great place for a date night or celebration! 🎉✨

We were pleasantly surprised by such a level of service. This is a restaurant on the top floor of a hotel with a sea view. Excellent service and great food. We ordered pork ribs, curry sauce, pasta with foie gras and some red wine. Everything was high quality. Highly recommended to visit!
We have enjoyed our dinner and the service also great given by Ms LY. Will definitely catch up when visit danang again.

My wife and I had an amazing experience dining here. It was a quiet night so it made the dinner ambience even better. The waitresses were very attentive. Food was really good and great tasting. The prices was reasonable for the highly quality dishes and experience. We were very happy with our dining experience. Very romantic settings too. Highly recommended.
We've been dining to this restaurant during 10 days. It is very authentic, the food is tasty and delicious. Separate thanks to Ly, who was super supportive and provided the best service. Thank you!

We ordered a mushroom pizza and a creamy veggie pasta (we’re vegetarians) from the rrstaurant. The pasta was good, the pizza was ok, but the service was good though. The girls were observant and very helpful. We also ordered lemongrass/ginger/lemon tea and hibiscus tea. It tasted really good w honey. Thank u for an awesome service!!

Average food, overpriced for what you get. Promotional photos were misleading—actual view was a letdown. Service was okay, but surprising lack of English in a Western-style restaurant. Disappointed overall.
We are celebrated our anniversary here. Good experience! Great place, very nice and helpful staff, tasty food :) our waitress- Kay made his work amazing good

Amazing view of the beach with live music and delicious food. I absolutely loved the meat combo with three different meats to try, it was amazing. If you're looking to have a nice fine dining experience with a premium experience this is the place to go. Truly the best experiences you can get in the city.
I enjoyed the ambience. The servers were attentive and helpful. The food was delicious.  I also loved and appreciated their thoughts of giving us Christmas treats, complimentary wine and turkey.
Very nice service and food! Thanks Kay for the passion and professionalism along my birthday dinner❣️

Simply amazing! 💛

We had our dinner here for our last night in Da Nang and I'm so glad we did. The service and staff were very impressive, they treat you like a queen.

The food was great, from the complimentary bread to appetizer to main dishes, sự hoàn mỹ!! We ordered Cheese and Smoked Meat Platter, Fruit Salad with Cheese, Four Cheese Pizza, and Flamingo Four. We didn't order dessert since we we're super full!

The restaurant was small but the ambience was simple and elegant, had both views of the city and the beach. We'll definitely be back here when we visit Da Nang again. Thank you!

I had a wonderful experience at this rooftop restaurant. The service was absolutely outstanding – incredibly fast and attentive, especially thanks to our waiter, Ly, who made the breakfast even more enjoyable. The view from the rooftop is stunning, creating a perfect atmosphere. The food was quite good as well, making it a great overall dining experience.

Delicious food menu. Loved the food and the ambience of the infinity pool, beautiful sunset and lovely inhouse decor. Table was so pretty. Minki did a lovely service. We were there on women's day and they made us  feel special 🥰🥰

Loved everything about this place. Easily the best food I've had in Vietnam. The staff are excellent and the music is great.

I did find it quite warm and perhaps more fans A/C would help but this was the only downside to a great time in the restaurant.

This restaurant also accepts card payments.
First up, service was excellent. Pork ribs were tender and really tasty, the ribeye was a little pricey but well worth the price. The food was a little unexpectedly good, so 5 stars for that.

Great food, great service, and wonderful staff!
Supervisor "Summer" is great and really made our night special, thank you!

I recently celebrated my birthday here, and it was truly an unforgettable experience! The staff went above and beyond to organize a beautiful surprise, making the entire evening feel so special. The food was absolutely delicious. The ambiance was warm and inviting, perfect for a celebration. I couldn’t have asked for a better place to spend my birthday. ♥️ Thank you to the amazing team, special thanks to VIET for making it so memorable—I’ll definitely be back! 🌹

My boyfriend surprised me with my birthday dinner here. The table was decorated, the food was amazing and the overall vibe of the restaurant was very classy. Ly served us and helped to pre plan everything, making this experience a 10/10. I really recommend coming here for celebrating or if you want a lovely dinner with a great view.

Service was excellent. The food was delicious and came in a timely manner. I ordered an appetizer and a meal. They waited until I finished the appetizer before my meal came. My meal was hot and done nicely. My server Kay tend to my needs and other staffs was also great. Thank you for a great dinner and night.

Enjoy the last meal in Da Nang, we come here because of the high score on Google map! The cuisines are not that special but still good. One thing I would like to noted is the kindness service of all staff here, and the comfy atmosphere really makes me cozy.
Amazing view, exceptional food and service, great quality and price. Very impressed!

I recently had the pleasure of dining at this beautiful restaurant, and I must say, the ambiance was stunning. The interior design and overall atmosphere created a truly delightful dining experience. The attention to detail in every corner of the restaurant was commendable.

Not only was the environment impressive, but the service provided by a staff member named Quyen was exceptional. Quyen went above and beyond to ensure that my dining experience was nothing short of excellent. From attentive care to prompt and friendly service, Quyen truly made me feel valued as a customer.

Now, let's talk about the food. The dishes served at this restaurant were absolutely delicious. Each bite was a burst of flavor and a testament to the chef's culinary skills. The menu offered a wide variety of options, and I was impressed by the quality and presentation of every dish I tried.

Overall, I highly recommend this restaurant for its stunning ambiance, attentive service from Quyen, and superbly delicious food. It's a true gem that I will definitely visit again in the future.

We had a great meal!
The staff is so nice!
Atmosphere🔥💥🔥💥

Dinner & drinks were amazing. Staff was attentive and so patient when we had card issue. The green mussels with cheese were delicious & beautifully presented. We’ll be making another visit before leaving

The food is good, especially medium-rare tenderloin. Seabass pasta is also delicious but the pasta need more time to cook. The staff is friendly and professional. Since the restaurant is quite small, you should make a reservation.

Other reviews is definitely not correct, view of the city not the ocean, is was dark not sure if you can see the ocean, even if you could the pool is in the way which makes a nice dinner feel sleezy, because you can see other people swimming.  Service was excellent, cheese plate was descent, not the best but not the worst.  Pumpkin soup was bland, Caesar salad was good, 5 meats flamingo was a big dud.  They cooked medium well, it was dry hard to swallow. So was the tenderloin. But the biggest issues was the Chilean sea bass.  False advertisement, definitely not Chilean sea bass.  The fish was much harder, and not buttery and melts in your mouth like other restaurants.  I don’t think it was Chilean sea bass.  The grill mussels was a little over cooked.  The food represented the price.  Not super expensive. Appetizers are a thumbs up, but entrees was not a that well cooked.  I was disappointed in the experience after reading most reviews online.  I would not eat there again.  The service was excellent.

Ambience is poor overall, most of the restaurant does not have a view. Only a few tables on one side.
Starters were ok. Salad and Seafood Tempura. Some of the fish was over cooked.
Ordered Signature Fillet Steak Medium.
Arrived Blue, sent back, arrived again very rare after being microwaved, sent back one more time and again arrived at a normal rare. 3 times and the kitchen could not cook their signature steak to a correct level.
The Shrimp Pasta equally very bland, arrived cold had to be sent back and was also microwaved. Only 1 small shrimp on the whole plate which was completely hard and way over cooked.
This is absolutely not fine dining.
Staff were fairly friendly and accommodating and offered a 50% discount on the steak and a complimentary ice cream.
Would not recommend or return, a very disappointing dining experience.

Lovely dinner this evening. Such a cute little restaurant. View of the city to the North. We had the most attentive waitress Minky. She is a gem. We had pork pâté and bread before our starter of chicken wings. Then we had bolognese and sea bass on rice for mains. Then the restaurant kindly gave us a mini desert right after of frozen strawberries, yoghurt covered in dark chocolate it was delicious. Then we decided to share a chocolate lava cake it was so nice. Lovely restaurant at the top of the hotel on the Da Nang sea front and again Minky was just a gorgeous human.

I was really impressed with the excellent service provided by Uyen and Bobby. They were so kind, attentive, and professional.

The seafood salad, seafood trio, and salmon pizza were all deliciously made. I also loved the drinks they served.

The restaurant has a great view of the sea, which added to the overall experience.

I truly enjoyed the whole fine dining experience. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great restaurant.
Great place a date night! They are willing to take your feedback to improve the dishes and customer services.
The food was amazing and the service was even more lovely. Kay was a wonderful server and the other staff were also very helpful.

Restaurant is placed at 20th floor with a nice view. There was no people when we went there and service was great. Set up of the table was beautiful and waitresses were extremely attentive. We have ordered soups (pumpkin and prawn), and seafood platter which were tasty. Unfortunately pizza was not to our expectations even though made with good cheese.
Great food! Calm atmosphere, Tunie served us and she was wonderful in making sure we were taken care of

We had an amazing dinner at the Sky View Restaurant last night. The food was delicious- especially the Tempura Seafood platter.  The service was exceptional and the ambience delightful. Would definitely recommend!!

Had my NYE 2022 dinner with my family.

When I message Sky View, they do reply you promptly.

Had to pay by credit card so that the reservation will be confirmed. I wasn't comfortable to email back my credit card details, thus on my arrival day, I came here to place a deposit.

However, they couldn't find my booking and I had to wait quite some time for them to confirm with their manager. Anyway after 30 minutes, everything was settled. I paid 50% deposit.

On the arrival day, the restaurant set up the place very beautifully. The whole area is small with maybe less than 10 tables.

Lack of communication between the manager and waitress cos she informed me that the wine is chargeable but when the manager messaged me, the person informed me that for more than 5 paying guest, they will give me a complimentary bottle.

There was a live band. Initially was very noisy but after a glass of wine, my family seems to be enjoying themselves.

The NYE 2022 dinner was a set meal. Choose the main either Wagyu or Salmon.

One of the Wagyu wasn't done as per informed. Medium. However it came out over cooked. Returned and same thing happened.

Overall the service was good and dinner was alright.

When I went to counter to pay, I noticed that the drinks counter was so messy. If this place is a fine dining place, they shouldn't allow any guest to view any messiness of the place.

Sad to say that I won't return as there are other options around the area. The whole bill came up to VND 8.5 million.

I went to Sky View Restaurant in Da Nang for Valentine's Day few months ago and I still remember this day. They gave us a very warm welcome and prepared the table beautifully. The prices are affordable, and the food is really good. The staff is very friendly, and the view was nice even though it was already dark. I highly recommend this restaurant!

Highly recommended.
We ordered a set menu with 4 Western courses for 300k per pax. The best dishes were cream pumpkin soup and grilled sea bass. The beef steak was just okay-ish.
The staff were extremely helpful. Once they found out that our desserts were not thawed properly (still frozen inside), they offered us a hot lava chocolate cake instead, free of charge.

Had a solo dinner here as a treat after a long work trip. Beetroot salad and the local catch of the day was delicious! You could tell the chef paid attention to detail. Fish was perfectly pan seared and everything was well seasoned.
I wanted a change from Vietnamese food, so I went to the Sky View Restaurant. The food was delicious, and the restaurant's Autmosphare was nice, with good service.
Cosy and romantic ambience, the restaurant also decorated birthday theme. We really loved the food, good portion. Highly recommended for anniversary/birthday celebration

Really nice place and luxury one. Love the atmosphere and service. Food is really good too. The waitress named Lisa is super friendly and helpful. Recommend to try mussels with cheese and pork ribs, steak and seafood. All is great! 5 star service with nice view.

My husband took us here after a full day photoshoot at Mai's and not having any food since 3 am that day. So the food might seem better than it really was. Even so, I would only give this place 3*. This place was listed at 9th place in a food blog of places to eat at Đà Nẵng, which makes me question the food critic's pallette.

As always, I'll do a worst to best out of my dishes:

(4) Baked mussels with Italian cheese: this was a huge letdown. The mussel smelled, and the cheese lacked salt. The mussel also wasn't baked well. I would have liked different cheese to be used, salt the mussel and grilled it over charcoal or something. As the way it was, it wasn't good at all.

(3) Flamingo four types of meat: heck, get this for the presentation alone, see video. The portion is big, so I would order this for 2 people. As a side, we had potato wedges, which needed salt (ask the kitchen for rock salt), and the mashed pumpkin, which omg was delicious. The meat was overall underwhelming if you've gone to a Brazilian steakhouse before.

(2) Vegetables curry: I had very low expectations for this dish after the waitress told me it's a bit thick. It's similar to a bisque, thicker than Vietnamese style, but was thinner than Indian style. I would eat it like a bisque and just ignore the bread. The bread should be served warm, in my opinion, along with the starter bread and butter.

(1) Tie: Sunrise smoothie/ tropical smoothie. If you love to instagram, these smoothies are for you. They looked like they were disassembled pieces of the smoothies, and I loved it. Layered so you'll have to mix them up, the smoothies are worth the splurged. The sunrise is sweet and, to me, a little bland, while the tropical has a sour kicked to it.

The service is more than excellent! I made reservations at 6pm on the website and received WhatsApp confirmation very quickly.

The food and wine are all greatly presented, the price is just slightly higher than I expected - around VND$2,300,000 for two person but it’s all good.

One of the best rated restaurants in Danang for international dishes! We had a Prawn Bisque Soup, Barbecued Chicken Wings & Sea Food Trio Platter and they were all out of this world 👍 Especially, their Barbecued Chicken Wings was the best we had ever had.. Highly recommended to dine with them when in Danang. …

Our dining experience was truly remarkable. The lobster was exceptionally prepared. The ambiance was sophisticated yet inviting, and the service was attentive without being intrusive. Highly recommended for those seeking a refined culinary experience.
We came for Christmas. Very good service and good food. Highly recommended. Kay’s service was good. Thank you.

We were the only 2 people in the restaurant, the staff on duty were preparing the tables for the next day.  Our drink order came,I ordered vodka and sprite. The sprite was missing. It took a while for my husband to find someone who couldn't understand, to go and find someone who could.  We didn't get a desert as a member of staff told us they wanted to close.  Then when we wanted to pay nobody could take the card payment so we had to traipse down to the reception to make the payment. It was rather embarrassing, following 2 members of staff of which one was holding forth our bill.  The was OK
Staff is so nice and helpful esp Ly. Would highly recommend for a delicious meal with a great view

We went to the Skyview Restaurant in Danang for dinner. The food was very good, but more importantly, we were served by Lisa, who provided excellent services. A very friendly, jovial and very nice person. I feel the restaurant is so lucky to have Lisa working there. 5 stars to Alison.
Lovely foods and so good staff Lý 🥰🥰❤️❤️❤️

I had a very special dinner here where I proposed to my girlfriend. Quin was extremely helpful with the planning of my surprise and managed to acquire flowers within a few hours and suggested great ideas for the big moment. Dinner service was great and the steak and lamb ribs were delicious. Massive thank you Quin and management!
Very tasteful reytaurant...food was amazing also stuff very helpful and kind..really did recomendad us good stuff..also ambient is amazing real great view..
Thank you Kay and all the team that organized a surprise for my boyfriend’s birthday!
Had a wonderful post-wedding celebration lunch 😁 great decor, great food and most importantly super friendly and welcoming staff here!  Strongly recommend
This is amazing place. I had the best memories with my friend here

We had such a lovely dinner here for our 1’st anniversary, they even sat up ballons for us!
Food was fantastic, and we got a nice bottle of french Bubble Wine for unly 1m to out food.
Summer did a fantastic job!

Reviewer_name: ปุณยนุช ชัยคําพา
Review_text: I was nice and got a lot food in the dish, i got mushroom soup and seafood cabonara. My boyfriend got a steak it was so very soft and nice meat, if i had a chance I'd come back here

My goodness the seafood platter was delicious. Sea bass, squid, mussels, tiger prawn, with a variety of seasoning, plus a tasty pumpkin purée. The portion was also generous. Very friendly service on top of that
Ate lunch with 4 other friends. The restaurant accommodated us without a reservation. The food, service, and atmosphere was very nice.
The service staff is very good. The food is delicious and the night view is great. The receptionist's name is Lisa. Her service is very good, cute. We will come back to use the service again.
Win, she was a superstar. Very kind and always smiling, made us feel very welcome. Beautiful views and lovely food. Will definitely recommend
delicious food and excellent service! celebrated a friend's birthday, were very pleased! Thank you 🤩 …

Food was so good! The crew makes sure your orders are met with your expectations.

The meat platter was so good and we got to try beef, chicken, pork and lamb!

Minky was amazing, really good service was very attentive to our service and even organised a birthday surprise for me ! Very happy with the recommendations and value! Definately would recommend this place to anyone in da Nang

Went on a Wednesday night with a group of 4 guys (all American). We ended up ordering Bone-In Ribeye, Seafood Temperu Trio, Baked Mussels with Italian Cheese, the Homemade Beef Burger, Black Spaghetti with Baked Prawn, and a bottle of wine for the table. I wish I had pictures because it all looked amazing, but unfortunately you’re just gonna have to take my word for it. Our server Quin was very accommodating as well and super professional. Overall my #1 recommendation would be the Seafood Tempera Trio (the sauce that comes with it is unreal). Good to share and good by itself as well.

Our experience here was fantastic. We enjoyed some beautiful Gnocchi and gorgeous desserts and amazing cocktails.
I must also add that my Fiancé had just lost her cellphone in our Grab car and the staff here, in particular, Tunie and her co-worker helped us get the cellphone back again. Without their helpfulness and friendliness, we would have never got the cellphone back again.
Beautiful, helpful and kind hearted Vietnamese people.
Highly recommend this amazing restaurant for the food and the caring, wonderful staff.
From Grant and Michelle
Food was delicious,  Summer and her team were excellent and very friendly , we really enjoyed our dinner
We had a wonderful dinner here. The staff are very nice and friendly. The food was extremely delicious. We have returned to the restaurant many times and everything is still great❤️.

Skip this restaurant. Overpriced low quality food. Ordered two steaks. They were unseasoned. They weren’t cooked to the proper temperature either. Also ordered a salmon pizza and it tasted so bland.  View for the bar was bad also. So disappointing. And the bill was insane for a Vietnamese restaurant.
The food was very good and beautiful presentation with a vibrant sky bar to go to afterwords a floor above.
A 5 star experience, Quin was very friendly and her service was excellent. The food was amazing and its a beautiful restaurant overall, would highly recommend for anyone who visits Da Nang
We really loved the ambience, the hospitality of Lisa who was really courteous and helpful. The food was superb and the price was good.
Fun place to visit top floor where we stay. Thu is the customer manager who is so nice and kind to take care of us very well
Great service by Kay and good steak!

What a lovely restaurant
Exceptional quality food and service
Would highly recommend. …
Amazing food. Attentive service. I want to return to try some of the amazing steaks. This time I only wanted a burger and soup and it did not disappoint. Highly recommend.
Food is delicious. A good place for important event such as anniversary or birthday

Honestly, I have to say that this place was great from the services to the food. My fiancé did a surprise birthday party and also a proposal here for me. Everything was perfect. The staff was very helpful in getting everything prepared when …

very nice restaurant, we ordered two pastas and they were ok, the cocktails were quite weak but also ok the service was very very nice, even too nice, we were the only guests in the restaurant (2 people) and we felt the staff's eyes were …

Food was absolutely amazing perfect for sharing or eating separately, coming from Australia the food at home is incredibly expensive compared to very reasonable prices here given the presentation, the staff were absolutely lovely and overall great experience
Lisa was very responsive to all our family needs. Excellent customer service. 100% satisfaction with meals and service. Highly recommended.
Food is good and the staff is very polite and understanding. Loved the stay with my family.
Nice view from the restaurant, staff were attentive.  Food was well presented.
Fine dining restaurant with nice ocean view. Food was great especially the tiger prawn pasta. Nice and friendly staff.
Waitress Lisa provides excellent service, warmly recommend tourist spot for us. Sweet smile.

Absolutely amazing. Staff attentive and food magnificent. Tunie and Summer were lovely.
Beautiful view xx
Very good! Definitely will come back again!
Great service, tasty food)

Celebrated our anniversary here and we were well taken care of. The ambience is nice and the staff were really nice and responsive. Food was actually tasty, just that my steak was a bit closer to rare than medium rare. Otherwise, still a good place !

They were able to accommodate our last minute reservation. The food selection was many. The view was beautiful. Our order for 4 types of meat and the black pasta were delicious. The wine they served was also superb. Free post-meal kombucha …
Amazing service, great atmosphere and food selection. Lisa was a great host and took really good care of us.
Very great overall experience at the Sky View Restaurant. Quiet place with great food, and the service made by Ly was perfect !

The price is acceptable and the staff are all good

The whole vibe I love it
Great food, friendly staff and welcoming atmosphere. Everything was fresh and delicious. A big thank you to summer and the team, will definitely be coming back 👏👏👏
Super friendly staff and tasty food.Got served by Kay(Hung) he was super friendly and even helped me with tips to plan my stay in Da Nang
Wonderful food staff are great coming back tomorrow great value for money
i like this place so much!! LY served us and she was very attentive and sweet.

Outstanding Service!

We recently had the pleasure of being served by Quin, an exceptional waitress at this establishment. Her attentiveness, friendly demeanor, and prompt service truly enhanced our dining experience. We appreciate her professionalism and dedication to ensuring customers feel welcome. We highly recommend this restaurant, thanks to the outstanding service provided by their wonderful staff, especially Quin who went above and beyond to make our visit memorable.

We dined a la carte. The price is little pricey but you pay what you get. We love the service, the food and the ambiance. Our waiter is fantastic. Je explained in detail each of our dishes and recommended the one we should try. Because of the high wind that night, We skip the skybar which has a quite panoramic view.

Came here after reading most of the reviews are pretty good, and it didn’t disappoint us. The food was great, and Lisa the waitress treated us in a very nice way. Menu could be customized a bit to suit personal preferences, which was a plus for us. We felt very relaxing sitting by the window, seeing the famous Lady Buddha and the pagoda in distance.

Had a lovely experience at the hotel and restaurant. The staff was amazing and very welcoming. Loved our experience here! Special mention to Lisa who was really kind and always had a smile on her face. She was very helpful and attentive and catered to all our needs. Would definitely come back here and recommend this place to friends and family!
We really enjoyed our experience here! The food was great, the atmosphere was great, but best of all - the service. They paid attention to our needs the entire time. 5 stars!
Tumie was our waitress, she was perfect and all the food was so delicious

the vibe chill & relax,
foods are good
thanks Kay 's warmest serving
it's a comfy night

The service was so detailed-oriented. Staff was so friendly and worked quickly and efficiently. The food was great, every meal from the appetizer to our main course got tastier. Would recommend visiting!

Minky and Summer were very attentive and friendly.
Excellent customer service!
Great food and ambiance!
Set menu was very delicious, salmon was fresh. Service of staffs were very excellent, friendly and helpful, especially Quin and Van
Great food, service and view of the city! Kay was an excellent server and gave me recommendations for Da Nang city. Very happy!
Beautiful sky view to the sea, very good service, professional staff, delicious food, great presentation. The most delicious tea and soup.
The food is so good! Lisa gave us the best service!

Nice view with air con 😄Ms.Win is very professional take care our table
and lovely food

Disappointing experience at Sky View Restaurant last night. Poor service, language barrier with our server who doesn't understand simple English.  There were also the kitchen timing issues where the main courses arrived before we finished our starters. Not worth the reputation.
Amazing view with very kind staff. You have to try mushroom soup and red velvet cake🙂
Tunie was the best server I have had in Vietnam.
The food was great and our server Ly was very attentive and welcoming,

Perpare birthday and propose marry
Nice food and service
Have a good arrange for the setting.
Amazing service from Win she speaks very well English and she is super good with checking very details

Got a really nice experience having a bday dinner here. The seafood, pasta and salads were very nice, the view was amazing and beyond that people and service are very welcoming, friendly and nice. They offered us to stay and watch the fireworks and also brought us kombucha to try. Thanks you!
Summer and her team made a fantastic NYE celebration for us. Food and service was impeccable and very reasonable price. Highly recommend.

We celebrated our kid's first birthday here with a small lunch within close family and it was a memorable experience. The staff is very nice, special kudos to Lisa for the decorations and making sure we enjoyed everything. The food is great and the views are panoramic. Highly recommend this restaurant.

Took my wife for dinner for our 25th anniversary. The restaurant had kept a window side seat with a fantastic view for us. In addition, they had decorated the table as well. The staff took extra care of us. The staff were very courteous and efficient.

I’m a regular fine diner/gastronomy/fusion restaurant attendee in Australia I am also super fussy and find this type of eating more pleasurable than street or food chain dining. My review is based on my experiences previously.
Summer and the team are excellent hosts a tip for a fine dining experience having an offering of water whilst the guest is looking at the menu is a perfect start to a meal.
I found the story behind the food choices very conflicting western food has an established flavour profile from each country and not all flavours match,  the bread with pate and sauce were random and didn’t really make sense not sure why the combination was chosen - I don’t like bread before a meal as I find it too filling and it ruins the meal - our mains were really yummy and cooked to perfection the menu however doesn’t make sense as the flavours of pesto gnocchi and Japanese Tuna don’t really go together? Nor did the rest of the combinations on the menu. My daughter had lava Cake which was a big hit I had tiramisu as it’s a favourite of mine however it was a cold cake with chocolate not what I would call a tiramisu the appetiser of kombucha and butter mousse were lovely but just did not work with the meal. My review is based on my day 4 experience of dining in Vietnam whilst also critiquing the experience compared to my western viewpoint.
Fine dining for me is about the restaurant telling me a story - it can be about Travel, or highlighting local produce or establishing new flavour combinations, or just showing the competition who is the best.
Thankyou very much for hosting us and best wishes for a successful restaurant.

Very attentive servers. We had Kay, who spoke English and was very polite and attentive to our table of 10 people. There were lots of drinks to choose from (cocktails, sodas, smoothies, juices, etc.), and plenty of foods besides steak.

Everything is wonderful.
Kay is friendly staff. We had a good time here

Great food with 5 star services.
Well deserve 5 stars
Will come back ❤️
The food is great and the service! A Must try!

Staff Kay is very friendly and helpful.

About the food, since the dish is at room temperature, the food will quickly become cold. Hope the restaurant can switch to hot plates.

Delicious food, excellent service and wonderful view. Best service I've experienced in Danang so far. They found a table for us on a Saturday evening in a couple of minutes, we just contacted them on facebook page. Definitely recommend and will be back again! Thank you, Sky View team ❤️

Lisa was one of the best servers I have ever had. My husband and I travelled from Canada and it was our first time visiting Vietnam and she was so professional, helpful and went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable.  Great experience! Thank you so much Lisa!

Everything about this place is immaculate! The staff are amazing and make you feel special, the food was superb and the presentation was even better. I'm not a big fan of sea foods, but I loved everything I tried. We were treated by a very delicious baguette and butter, and a salad as a complementary starter. I truly enjoyed the ambience. Thanks Skyview crew for the great experience!
Was here to celebrate my birthday on 4th April.  Service was warm and atmosphere is great.  The restaurant was not too noisy.  Their iberico pork had a lot of flavour.

Had our anniversary dinner at this place. It was a great experience. They even decorated our seating area. The staff was really humble and friendly. They were very much helpful and explained everything in detail. The view was great and Infront of the beach. Would suggest this place to everyone.
Ly was so friendly, very attentive and the service was a lot faster than anticipated.
Thanks to Lisa, we had a blast. Great service for a great moment. Thank you so much
The ambience is confortable and nice. Food served is also on point with affordable pricing for a 4 meal course meal with wine. Their staff is also friendly and helpful.

Exceptional service from
Ms. Lisa, very kind, very courteous, outstanding personality!

The waitress LISA was very nice and the food were delicious especially the flamingo seafood and the coconut ice cream. I was impressed by her service, she will ask you any things need and help you to change the dish or drink if you want.

Great food and good service
Lý is nice staff

i had a very wonderful time with my group at this restaurant. we had a lot of changes but the supervisor (van) is very cooperative and still fulfill our last minute request with a good assurance and smile. we had a very wonderful time and i really recommend this place to everyone reading this. Good job van and team!!
Absolutely loved this place, couldn't recommend it high enough. Great food, great atmosphere and great staff
Best service from Lisa and the Sky View resturant. A+
Entire family of 8 had a wonderful dinning experience.. Food and service well served
We had such a good time here and Win was so sweet. The drinks were great and they have a buy one get one for happy hour. View is awesome. Would go back for sure to see Win!
Lovely food. Good service from Kay.
The service was excellent. Especially my server, Win. The food was good. I enjoyed the sea bass fried rice. And the atmosphere is nice, with a view of the beach and calm music
Very delicious steak and Fried rice with Foie gras. The staff Quin served us well with detail explaining and smile. The atmosphere is good too with nice night view. The drinks is also tasty.

Our waitress (quyen i think?) Was extremely attentive and communicates effectively in English. She explained the new year's surcharge, and our meal ended up being reasonably priced for such a place, with a nice view and very good table service. We didn't have much expectations for stuff like buffalo wings and pizza in Danang, but everything was great quality. The seafood platter offered good variety, and a small flambé show to boot. Would recommend if you want western food.

Horrible experience: maybe that's why the restaurant was empty?
Kitchen staff has no idea how to cook food and inventory also displays lack of professionalism; lower-grade ingredients.
I rather eat a banh mi at a street food stall which is probably safer as they are intelligent in inventory.
2mil/2 ppl

0) the tempura was only thing of good quality. Low oil - cooked fine. Tartar was good as well.
1) amateur staff presented a wrong bill and took forever to give the bill/change. Food took a long time to arrive even there were only 4 other customers.
2) had the foie gra and chicken salad: probably the worst salads I had in my life, chicken was hot - why do you put hot chicken  in a salad? Assuming you were copying caesar salad with your very fishy dressing, where else in the world is it served like this????
Foie gras of a low quality and was cooked in a weird way - it was ruined by the chefs. Why do you cook foie gras before serving??? Its great as it is, maximally put some acidic/sweet element to it, that's enough.
Salads were pertruding with oil making it uneatable
3) beef steak I had to return to the kitchen because they served old meat that was like gum. I left the restaurant after this as i do not intend to risk my health on amateur managers and chefs not knowing how to do inventory correctly.
4) cocktails were too sugary.
A solid 1/10 and all the reviews here are fake and paid through SEO.
Why do you simply not provide a good service of acceptable quality? 2mil for 2 ppl is on the higher end of Da Nang -  It's not that hard to make a simple salad and a steak - why do you even have gold plattered beef on the menu if you can't source non-old beef that isn't like gum in the texture?
Where do you have your honour as staff and management?
If you managed to do good service - I would come back again as there is a lack of good Western food - you would have scored a good customer that isn't afraid to tip large and is loyal. Your mismanagement is hurting you in the long run and this will end in you closing.

Edit: sure, show your pictures of your steaks.
I as a customer don't care about your outdated billing system. Its not normal to wait so long or mess so many things up - name any top restaurant or any restaurant in general in da nang which takes such long time, bet you can't. You clearly misunderstood - i was not saying you were cheating, just that it was completely unprofessional.
Given your comments about SEO, you must not know how things are done / or are trying to hide your misuse of it.  Rather than deflecting a review which will help your business run better - why not try improving? It's obviously a mismanagement from the staff.
Friendly waiter. As a traveller, he willing to advise me good place travel around Danang I cluding recommendation in local food. I have a fantastic experience here.

Our dinner at Sky View Restaurant was amazing from every aspect. The service from the second we stepped inside,  (special thank you to Yuen!), was attentive without being intrusive and the food tasted as good as it looked. It’s been the best meal we’ve had in Danang.

Great place but requires reservations even if the place is empty. Came at 6:30, put us at a non-ideal location even though it was empty. Left at 8 and the place was still empty.

Management hasn’t quite figured out how to manage walk in vs reservation. So just don’t walk in.

They add 15% surcharge for holiday, I guess kinda standard.
Great restaurant with good food, especially the lamb chops. Shout out to Kay, MVP of the night. Thank brother! 🙏
I am very pleased with my experience here. The staff, especially Lisa, are very friendly and provided excellent service to my family. The food and ambience here is great!
We celebrated our engagement at Sky View Restaurant and enjoyed the food and great service. Really beautiful views too! Would recommend for a finer dining experience in Da Nang - Mel & Kim
It was a great experience. Nice place, food, Summer give us a very good and attentive host.

taste: Delicious and delicious food
price: The price is very reasonable compared to the user places
location:Extremely beautiful view from the 20th floor
service: good

Had a really great experience! Order the chicken wings and you get wet wipes, order prawns and they peel it on the table. Food taste AMAZING !
Just one thing that got me was, there was soup on the menu and no spoon set on the table, aaaaaargh !. Outside of that one small detail, it was FLAWLESS ! A proper fine dining restaurant ! (A lot of restraunts in da nang claim" fine dining" because they sell seafood, these guys actually do it ! )

A Delightful Culinary Haven - Sky View Restaurant in Da Nang

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Sky View Restaurant in Da Nang, Vietnam, and the experience left an indelible mark on my taste buds and overall dining expectations. As an Indian visitor, I found this establishment to be a true gem that beautifully encapsulates the essence of excellent service, delectable cuisine, inviting ambiance, and vibrant vibes.

From the moment we stepped in, the warmth of the staff made us feel right at home. The service at Sky View is exemplary, with the staff displaying genuine friendliness and attentiveness. Their knowledge about the menu and willingness to accommodate our preferences added a personal touch to the dining experience.

The culinary journey at Sky View was nothing short of spectacular. The menu offers a diverse range of dishes that cater to various tastes, and each dish is a masterpiece in its own right.
The ambiance at Sky View is enchanting. The restaurant lives up to its name, providing breathtaking panoramic views of Da Nang.

In conclusion, Sky View Restaurant in Da Nang is a must-visit for anyone seeking an exceptional dining experience. The combination of impeccable service, mouthwatering cuisine, inviting ambiance, and lively vibes makes it a standout choice in the vibrant culinary scene of Da Nang. I wholeheartedly recommend Sky View to locals and travelers alike, as it has undoubtedly become a highlight of my time in Vietnam.

My friend and I walked in at 10.15pm cuz we were hungry and our hotel's restaurant closed. So we searched on Google for open restaurants and found this one. The lady that greeted us seemed confused and told us that we can only order until 10.30 so I said yeah that's fine we will decide right away and she was still confused like didn't want us to be there. So we ordered like 5 minutes later but the whole process was weird and we didn't feel welcomed there.  I mean I don't know if it's a cultural thing to not expect more guests during the last hour, but for me if a place closes at 11 it means that I can still walk in at 10.15. So the food arrived at like 10.35 and at 10.50 she told us that they are closing in 5 minutes and shes gonna pack our food (didnt even ask if we want it take away). So I just payed my bill and left disgusted. Didn't leave any tip because they did not deserve it. Very disappointed, they could have handled it in another way.
We had a great dinner at Sky View! The food was tasty and the service was outstanding. Special shout out to our servers Helen and Quin for being patient and so accommodating. Thank you!
LISA is an excellent and polite staff in the Nem restaurant. She has taken care to serve us the right breakfast according to our taste.
Awesome place to chill. Da Nang sky view is Wonderful! Come check it out!

Two appraisers, two drinks, and it comes out to over 600k VND, Sky View is expensive.

The ambience on the 21st floor and the view of the night skyline are very nice. The menu is varied and very appealing with pictures (tablet) and more detailed descriptions.  The dishes were very good in terms of taste and appearance. We can highly recommend the mango salad.  We would particularly like to praise the service from Summer and Tam.  They accompanied our dinner very lovingly, discreetly attentively and, above all, very professionally. Summer is charming and authentically warm and authentic and she loves her job.  Thank you for the nice evening.

I visited on Valentine's Day and was very disappointed with the service quality. Although the space and view looked quite nice, the service really made me feel uncomfortable. The service staff was very bad, they brought dishes that were not the same as what was requested and their attitude was very confusing. I made a reservation in advance, it was Valentine's Day so there was a combo program or something, when I booked I said I didn't care but when I got there the staff said we had already ordered the combo?? While we didn't even know what the combo was :))
The manager handled it very quickly and very professionally so I accepted it.

📍Food
The visual of the food is good. However, I think the taste of the food is a bit disappointing. Although it is a high-class restaurant, the taste of the food, especially the meat, is a bit disappointing.

📍Service
The service is very good. All the staff are friendly and the service is fast.

📍Atmosphere
If you sit by the window, the atmosphere is quite good.

📍Overall
I can't say that it is definitely a place worth visiting. The atmosphere is okay, but a restaurant should have good food first... Since it feels quite disappointing... I don't think I can say that I would actively recommend it.
