The food style was neither here nor there, a fusion of East and West, and completely unsatisfactory.

Unconventional ingredients. For example, pigeon meat and beef kidney.

The flavor of the ingredients was masked by sauce.

Let's just say it was an experiment.
So what about the wine pairings?

The wine was Vivino, priced in the 20,000-50,000 won range, which is a good value. They even gave me enough to fill just the bottom of my glass.

I was worried I'd get drunk after eight glasses, but...

I was like, "How can you order three glasses in Korea?"

The pairing was expensive, so I considered ordering a bottle.

The wine list was quite good, so I was excited about the pairing, so I went with the pricey pairing...

How could I have been so disappointed?

The price was 250,000 won per person.

They took back the star from Michelin, but why did they advertise it as a one-star Michelin?

I usually take photos of dishes before eating them... Here, it was impossible; I was so eager to try them.
In this restaurant, you have a complete experience: the atmosphere, the design and lighting of the restaurant, the presentation of the dishes, the colors, the aromas, and, of course, the wonderful, varied, and sometimes unexpected flavors.
An incredible experience.
The staff is exceptional, always present but discreet, knowledgeable about the food served, and always attentive to the needs of the guests. Their English is excellent. Alessio, too, is a chef of another level, without a doubt.
Thank you all for the wonderful evening.
Everything was wonderful.  I wish we had bigger stomach.

I've been to Michelin restaurants in Italy that weren't as good as this outstanding Italian restaurant in Vietnam. It had ingredients from Japanese cuisine and a delicate balance of flavors -- my salad had one piece of different kinds of fruit and vegetables that all lent their own sweetness, sourness, and bitterness. The little appetizers reminded me of mezze style eating in Turkey (you can ask for half size portions here, which I also do at mezze restaurants in Turkey). There was a chef's menu, kind of like omakase in Japanese cuisine. The dishes were clean and light, small and garnished with some sort of Vietnamese herbs. There are many Michelin rated restaurants in Vietnam, and they are good, but underwhelming. This one truly deserves its status.

5 out of 5

The food was definitely the highlight of the restaurant but the service team deserves praise for their excellent hospitality and knowledge.

There were amuse-bouche served to us before dinner and they were incredible. Especially the fish ball.

I'd recommend the mushroom ravioli and the fish of the day bbq. Both were my favourites!
One of the best fine dining experience. Chef is beyond creative, using a broad mixture of local ingredients. A must try when you happen to be in Danang.

had a delightful evening celebrating our wedding anniversary at Si Dining! The ambience is lovely! The menu is curated specially to blend the authentic Italian taste with Vietnamese local produce..

Head chef Alessio had specially prepared a vegetarian and scrumptious meal for me.
Mimi provided impressive service and recommended us with the right food and drink combination.. Since I had made a reservation in advance, informing the restaurant about my anniversary, they even prepared a complimentary starter as well as special dessert for us! Great hospitality by the team.

This has been the best dining experience we have had so far in Vietnam. Hoping to visit them next time!
They are a perfect restaurant to get the Michelin accreditation, plating, ambiance, service, food. Everything was outstanding

The quality of the food and service experience made it worth.
We were greeted with a complimentary small croissant filled with ham—an unexpected and delightful start to the meal. We ordered the delightful beef tartare and squid, followed by the perfectly cooked 3-way lamb and duck. To my surprise, the restaurant offered a complimentary free chocolate, which was a lovely touch and a perfect end to the meal.
The staff was very attentive. The pace of the meal was just right, and the overall experience was seamless.
I highly recommend this restaurant for anyone looking for a memorable dining experience.

I ordered BBQ squid and pappardelle (which oh my god remind me wildly of pasta with stew 😂) it was delicious, filling and beautiful! 
Negroni is so strong that one cocktail is enough 😂

Conditionally recommended. Service and ambiance were excellent. We both had the five-course menu plus a special accompaniment. I was somewhat disappointed by the quality of the individual components. My wife was less critical. Overall, it was a pleasant evening with a few culinary flaws. I would have expected more in this regard.

Signature course for 2 + 2 glasses of wine + mineral water
.
One-liner: From 6:30 PM, for roughly 4 hours, every moment I experienced the food, my brow furrowed only when it was delicious, and I couldn't help but feel a pang of truth...
.
As I paid and left, I wondered what I would do if I looked upset.

From the wine recommendation to the unexpected desserts,
I was so grateful.
It might seem expensive to some, but considering the value of the experience, I think it was worth the money.

Nice decor and ambience... The food was fusion and full of flavors. The reason for 4 stars when comes to food was due to the texture of the pasta sheets. The pasta was not as "silky smooth" as it should be. Other than that, I personally couldn't fault the dishes.

Service staff were friendly and attentive. Overall, it was a great night out at Si Dining.

Wishing them all the best and hopefully they will get a Michelin Star soon...

Six of us were blown away. Every dish is delicious, particularly the steak, beetroot salad, ravioli…
Service by Mimi is exceptional who recommended us all the perfect dish and dessert.
If you are looking for fine dining in Danang, check this out.
Exceptional dining experience! Delicious food, great drinks, amazing environment and service!

What a nice place! In the middle of Da Nang, but in a cosy and quiet area where you can hear the birds singing 🎵
And here you also can get an Italian-Vietnam fusion kitchen, and it tastes incredible!
The staff is super friendly and the house melts into the surroundings in a greater way.
Highly recommended!
Simply amazing! Italian-Vietnamese fusion food in a quiet and cozy spot.

It's often said that a good Italian restaurant can be judged by its tiramisu and by that measure Si wins hands down! Alessio Rason, the chef and co-founder, also garners high praise for his excellent Italian dishes using local ingredients and for innovative dishes such as pork belly flavored with cà cuống fish sauce. FYI cà cuống is a Vietnamese water bug that's prized as food and used to make fish sauce and essential oils. The restaurant also is beautifully decorated in a low key Vietnamese style that's quite unique. Check out the back wall!
Reasonably priced meals. Had a great birthday dinner here. Service from Mimi was spectacular. Number of courses is a bit much for my liking but overall enjoyed the dinner.

10 points for food and service, comfortable space, suitable for enjoying the evening here. I used the Classi set, the BBQ grilled squid was very delicious and the fake dog pasta was both strange and familiar, in general 💯
I like the little staff with braces =))))) taking care of customers very enthusiastically, talking super cute 😽

This is a wonderful Italian restaurant. It is amazing to have such a high standard of Italian food in Da Nang. All the food was perfectly delicious. The wine selection is excellent and relatively inexpensive. The restaurant is small, but the service staff is large, well-trained, and seamless. The restaurant is small, but the service staff is well trained and the service is seamless. I will definitely return when I come to Da Nang.

This is a wonderful Italian restaurant. It is amazing to have such a high standard of Italian food in Da Nang. All the food was perfectly delicious. The wine selection is excellent and relatively inexpensive. The restaurant is small, but the service staff is large, well-trained, and seamless. I will definitely return when I come to Da Nang.

Absolutely splendid. Excellent food, service, and atmosphere!

To start, they give you complimentary snacks that set the expectation of the dining experience. The croissant with ham on it is brilliant but my personal favorite was actually the pickle radish. It was sweet and tangy - very refreshing.

We had the a la carte menu as the set seems to be a lot of food. The squid for starters was so nice. It is very tender and you can taste the char on it! For main, we got pigeon with foie gras and the lamb. Both of it has layers of flavor - we absolutely enjoyed it.

The service was exceptional. The warm towel at the very beginning was a very nice touch especially when it was raining and quite chilly.
With micheline star and good service

Si Dining is a fantastic restaurant that masterfully blends Italian cuisine with Vietnamese ingredients, creating a truly unique and unforgettable dining experience. The fusion of flavors is innovative and well-executed, making every dish stand out.

I’ve been to this place many times in the past, enjoying its peaceful and intimate atmosphere. However, ever since it received recognition from the Michelin Guide, the restaurant has become even more refined and professional in every detail, from presentation to service.

The staff are not only friendly but also very knowledgeable about the dishes, always ready to provide thoughtful recommendations.
Si Dining is a must-visit for those seeking a special culinary journey in a quiet yet sophisticated setting.
The food is great and they are friendly. Good prices.

The restaurant has a great space. The food is a mix of Western and Vietnamese dishes, prepared very well and eye-catching by the chef. A good choice for families or couples who want to enjoy Western style.
We had a fabulous last dinner in Vietnam at Si. The food was fantastic, the restaurant itself is beautiful, it was all perfect. Would go again
One of the best places in Vietnam. A must in the country.

The culinary experience here was truly outstanding. Every dish showcased both creativity and exceptional flavor - you can tell the chef really puts thought into creating unique combinations that actually work. The service staff went above and beyond, being attentive without hovering and knowledgeable about every item on the menu. Special mention to their champagne selection, which was fantastic and perfectly complemented our meal. The attention to detail from the kitchen to the front of house made for a delightful evening that exceeded expectations.

Stayed in Da Nang for 3 days - was recommended this restaurant by an Italian guy working in my hotel. Beautiful Italian food, great wine list for Vietnam and friendly, attentive service. The Italian head chef called Alessio even dropped …

It was really delicious. I was a little worried because other reviews said it wasn't that good, but it was so delicious that I felt sad that the food was decreasing the more I ate. The servers were also very polite, and when I asked for the menu, they explained it in detail and kindly in English. They even watched me finish my meal and leave before going back into the restaurant. Very good.

This is a Michelin starred restaurant in Da Nang.
The atmosphere inside the restaurant is very atmospheric.
All the dishes were delicious, perhaps a fusion of Italian and Vietnamese cuisine.
The risotto and tiramisu were superb.
We had hair in our lamb dish + too many mosquito's in the restaurant. I got bitten 9 times while dining.

A high quality Italian-Japanese meal
Feel the Japanese elements and the chef's passion for trying new food
Food has surprises
Wine pairing with a few pieces of food
The restaurant also has a nice festive atmosphere

Absolutely high cost performance
Among the several fine dining restaurants I’ve tried in Da Nang, this is the one I recommend the most!
Next time I go there, I will definitely go there

The whole experience was so Excellent! I enjoy the environment,  food quality and wine! The staff is very hard working and patient to customer need!  And finally the price is very reasonable when compare to the find dining!  Strongly recommend!

great environment
we celebrate birthday here

"We went there last month and now I have time to review this restaurant. Si Dining is a very beautiful restaurant. I like the ambiance here; it is quiet with nice decoration. The food was delicious, and the service was kind. I highly recommend this restaurant if you are looking for an Italian dining experience."

The whole dining experience is much better than I expected.

The restaurant location is quite unique and the atmosphere is great!

Staff are friendly and helpful. Since they have a lot of waiters and waitress so that to make sure every table is served well. One little advice : staff may need to train more on wine knowledge so that they can share more for wine pairing intro.

Food: amazing. Creative plating and great taste. I could tell the tasting layer and the ingredients was fresh.

Overall experience was so great. Highly recommended.
Amazing food and service! Had the seasonal risotto..wow…and the wine pairing is amazing! Will be back for more!
Fantastic meal and service last night from Si. Everything 10/10. I highly recommend for anyone looking for a nice dinner to celebrate
Outstanding implementation of local profiles to European flairs . Worked brilliantly such as sesame, Thai basil and Asian inspired spices.bravo!
Cuisine was magnificent. Service excellent. Wine pairing completed a wonderful experience.

Absolutely fantastic experience!
Love the chef adding a bit of Asian twist to every dish. And the Tiramisu is one of the best I've tried in my life so far :)
The atmosphere and service are amazing as well.

one of the best dining experience in a while. The food are mind-blowing. To us, it's of very reasonable price with such quality. (it's probably pricey here but compared to other big cities in the world, it is of very good value of money.) Good recommendation by Michelin.

Must save some space for dessert!
What a great night and fantastic food and service
Quiet restaurant. Very delicious Italian food. Suitable for the taste.
Wonderful experience from start to finish.
Great. You should definitely go there.

Found this amazing cozy Italian restaurant (hidden gem)! Delicious dishes cooked by the chef, amazing hospitality…dedicated to serve with their hearts and give you a wonderful (yummy) dining experience!
Si Dining is an Italian restaurant with delicious food and good ingredients. You should book a table before coming.
In all honesty, the best restaurant in this city. Alessio is a magician.
All time favorite restaurant of mine. Food is amazing, atmosphere and service always lovely. They have good wine collection as welk

This is a review written on the second day of my trip to Da Nang.

People who read this review …
Top quality restaurant! Completely satisfied with the food, service & atmosphere.

Phenomenal food. Beautiful atmosphere. Fantastic service! Long review blow.

Although I cannot say I've been to many fancy restaurants before, this is the …
Beautiful food and great service!

Si Dining is truly impressive! The staff are professional and attentive, ensuring a seamless dining experience. The dishes are not only unique but also beautifully presented—each plate is a work of art. A special highlight was the head chef …
Italian food is quite delicious, portions are just enough. I ate 3 dishes and 1 wine. Các e phục vụ thì siêu dễ thương, chu đáo lắm. When you come to Danang, you must try it
Amazing food and service, we enjoyed every single dish, would recommend to everyone come to try~
Delicious, beautiful, chill
Fine dining in Da Nang with a great atmosphere and good value for money
Overall service was okay. Unacceptable to find a fish bone in the dish, service staff made no attempt to inform chef (nothing was done if chef actually knew about it) and no apology. …

Its remote location makes it difficult to coordinate schedules, but it's worth the trip. I didn't try the signature course, so my assessment of the food is subject to change. The menu offers a well-balanced blend of Italian, French, and …
nice place for couple and familes .Thank you very much
Incredible food and atmosphere, perfect place for a date night , occasion & celebration.

The rye bread before the meal was truly impressive.
The food was delicious, but the portions were too small.
The food was delicious, but the plates were more like Korean rice bowls, so it felt like eating regular food.
The atmosphere was great, and the servers were very helpful.

Was cracking my head to find a place to celebrate my husband's birthday in Da Nang when i chanced upon Si Dining on Google.

Read through the reviews and was sceptical that this place has a perfect score, but i decided to give it a go and made a reservation.

Staff handled the reservation professionally and effectively.

I ordered their signature course with and additional starter and a Main which was nothing short of phenomenal.

The way the chef was able to incorporate different ingredients and flavours was mind blowing.

The knowledge and attentiveness and level of personalization offered by the restaurant and service staff was superb.

Both my husband and myself thoroughly enjoyed the grastronomical experience and impeccable service.

All i can say is Bravo Sia dining, you are now one of the top in my list of recommendations.🥰❤️❤️
Had the full course menu. Food was excellent, crafted with local herbs. Staff were warm and friendly. They Surprised my partner with a bday cake as well!
It's delicious. However, it is unfortunate that the mint, coriander, and basil flavors disappear in the mouth due to the common herbs throughout. But it's still delicious
Good atmosphere, nice food, and pleasant night.
Really nice spot, service and food was great. Really nice complimentary starters and sweets as well. Highly recommended

A wonderful restaurant with an interesting menu and very delicious dishes. The food here felt like it was from a high-end restaurant. I especially loved the scallop sashimi. The rest of the food was also quite tasty. The presentation was very unique, and I highly recommend visiting!
The food and service were excellent. This restaurant definitely made my first trip to Vietnam enjoyable! I will definitely return when I go to Da Nang again.

Had a great evening dining with four other friends at this amazing gem. The food the ambiance and the service were second to none
Well done Si Dining Team
Cant be better

As a frequent visitor, I absolutely adore Si Dining! The ambiance is peaceful and inviting, with an open layout, lush greenery, and soft lighting that sets the perfect mood. The staff consistently go above and beyond to make every visit memorable, with a special shoutout to our waitress Tran, who always welcomes us warmly and pays close attention to detail. Chef Alessio's culinary creations are unmatched; each dish I've tried is a unique blend of flavors and a feast for the eyes. Si Dining is my top choice in Da Nang, whether for a romantic date night or a celebration with loved ones. If you're looking for a place to wine and dine, look no further than Si Dining!
I came with my wife and had a delicious course meal in a comfortable atmosphere. I am very satisfied.

It was really delicious. It tasted so luxurious. I was amazed the whole time I was eating, wondering how they could come up with such a flavor. If I had this kind of food in Korea, it would have cost about 2.5 times more. The reason there are so many food pictures is because I ordered so much. I was curious about all the dishes, so I ordered almost everything. Next time I go to Da Nang, I will definitely come back!
Very good environment, well-train staff, very friendly and professional, and more important is excellent food!

Best gourmet restaurant I’ve been to on my two week trip through Vietnam. Amazing & well worth it  for a special evening!

Impressive wine list & excellent wine pairing (blanc-rosé-rouge, each one a lovely discovery :-)) available with the set menu. Loved it!

I’ve been here a few times already and always impressed by this place. When they have ravioli I def get it. They also do pigeon that is so tasty and unique.

I’ve done the tasting menu with wine pairing twice and it’s been excellent each time. Not only is the food delicious but the service is exceptional!

After a week in Vietnam, we were looking for a place to eat Italian and feel at home, and Alessio, the chef at Sì Dining, made us feel right at home. His hospitality, kindness, and the genuine goodness of his dishes were the perfect recipe!
Creative and perfect course, delicious and well-seasoned food, good atmosphere, servers friendly, communicative and quick-witted, I was so happy

I really love this restaurant. The first time I came was in December 2023 and this time when I came back, the menu had changed. Every dish here has a feeling that the chefs put a lot of heart into creating dishes for diners. I really appreciate the way they do it. The staff is also a highlight of the restaurant in terms of thoughtfulness, enthusiasm and understanding of the product. Si will be the place I choose to visit every time I have the opportunity to come to Da Nang ♥️♥️♥️
It was unique. We had fine wine, and it was a pleasure to be in this wonderful atmosphere. The staff was very attentive. We'd be happy to return!

The food is really great. All the dishes are delicious and the staff is professional, cute and enthusiastic. The restaurant also gave me a cake on my anniversary. This is probably the ideal dating place in Da Nang, I will definitely come back next time😍

If I could give 6 stars I would

The service is INCREDIBLE, the food is amazing and the atmosphere is very very nice

I will be back, what a great dinner!

I have high expectation before coming as this is a michelin star restaurant, and it did not disappoint me. We ordered one classic set and ordered 1 main and 1 starter. The portion is each dish is quite a lot and enough for sharing among 2 persons. The dish here is like fusion of Japanese and Italian cuisine. Each dish tastes special and is quite delicious. Highly recommended for special occasion like birthday or anniversary celebration. The atmosphere here is great too!

The best taste of my life - that's the word to describe this restaurant. Perhaps because it had just been registered as a Michelin star, it wasn't very busy. However, the service and food were excellent, and perhaps because the chef had trained at a restaurant in Kyoto, they had dishes including tuna sashimi, which Japanese people would be thrilled to try. (Apparently, Chef also trained at a restaurant in France.) We didn't choose the set course this time, but the four of us chose everything and it came to a surprising 15,000 yen, and my family and I even agreed that we wouldn't mind paying more. This is a wonderful restaurant that makes you want to come back and try other dishes, so please enjoy it.
Friendly staff, delicious food, and a perfect venue make this a place that will make you feel good about coming to the end of your Vietnam trip.
Super good restaurant! We went there twice and it was always excellent with great service! I recommend it
Incredible five star restaurant and sweetest chef
Great foods, great services. My must go place every time in Da Nang.
Delicious food which blends local and international cuisines which comes at top end prices

I pride myself on eating a lot of delicious food, but this restaurant was the best, definitely in my top 3 for the food I ate this year..! There were many dishes that showcased the chef's creativity, and there was nothing lacking in taste/plating/service. 2 hours passed quickly, and I was so grateful to be able to eat a Michelin chef's dish🫢 The sashimi and mackerel pasta could have been fishy, but it was fresh and had a unique taste without any of that. The steak was medium rare, cooked just the way I wanted it, and the pumpkin sauce went really well with the steak🤤 The tiramisu cream that I ordered separately was so delicious that I ate it all up. The staff was also very kind, and I didn't have to think about other fine dining options. It's the best course that I will remember for a long time.

I had an amazing experience here!
The complimentary bread course was elaborate and fantastic. The fish ball has a perfect crispy coating and mild, meaty fish inside. I also loved the shaved carrot pickles. The butter itself was special, spiced with with an exciting mix flavors.

The bruschetta was okay. it looked beautiful and the flavors were nice--the smoky eggplant especially--but I didn't feel like i was eating anything special. I wish it had more of a bite to it or another savory element. The bread was more like whole grain toast than bruschetta. Still yummy but wouldn't get again.

The barracuda catch of the day was fantastic. Some tart salty crumbly topping. The sauce was like a pumpkin symphony with an impossibly savory flavor. The pumpkin puree had a pleasant muted flavor that balanced out the fish perfectly.

The bill came with a chocolate popsicle with marzipan inside. So cute!

Throughout the meal, service was also
impeccable - above and beyond what I would expect from even a fine dining restaurant. For example, when I left half of the bruschetta on my plate and told them I got too full, the waitress said she would wait 15 min until putting in the next dish so I would have time to digest. After my meal, the hostess actually walked me out and we chatted about travels and the restaurant. She showed me a safe spot to wait for my grab. While I was waiting, someone brought me bug spray. Then the chef came out to greet me and we chatted for a few minutes! The staff was so kind and attentive. Importantly, I never felt out of place for dining alone. Would highly recommend this restaurant for a pleasant experience and great food.
I was able to enjoy a neat and leisurely meal, and it was a place where I could enjoy a Michelin chef's course meal at a reasonable price!! It was a good way to end my trip.
Great food and service ❤️

Very reasonably priced for the amount of work and effort that has obviously gone into making this place exist.
Staff are incredibly attentive and professional.
The owner came and had a quick word after dinner but was not intrusive at all.
Atmosphere is excellent.
Quality and variety of produce is amazing.
A very creative menu, with attention given to every single layer of preparation of every dish.

I regret not visiting this place sooner, but was reluctant due to most restaurants in Danang being below average at best.

Si Dining definitely does not disappoint and this place deserves a lot more attention than it receives.

Will definitely be back and highly recommend this place.

Everything is great, except for the sound, which I find a bit tiring. Maybe the beats music is a bit fast like going to a fashion show 🥲 I eat but I'm always in a hurry, and I get nervous because my heart beats fast to the music. Restaurants can change to softer music, so customers can slowly, deeply, and enjoy the food more. Thank you to the staff, the security guard for being so enthusiastic, thank you to the chefs for the wonderful meal. The chef comes out to greet each table. I think it's also a highlight of the restaurant when they feel warmly welcomed ❤️ everything is very professional and neat!
Incredible dinning experience! It’s pricey but worth totally considering the service, the food the details, the quality. Couldn’t recommend more!

📍Si Dining | Da Nang

Separate from the bustling bustling area of shops and restaurants, Si Dining chose a private, airy corner on the banks of the Han River. Open architectural space, spacious and luxurious design, beautifully decorated.
The set menu is mainly taken from the alc menu so we choose the dishes. Because we were still full in the afternoon, we ordered just enough.
Orange fish starter is very delicious and just right. The beef dish tastes fresh and delicious.
Maincourse I choose fish of the day and that day the grouper was cooked to the most delicious and smooth level.
We are dessert lovers so we ordered 2 dishes, Panna cotta guava and Hanoi plum - both dishes were very harmonious, especially the Panna cotta dish when we ate it, we still felt like we could eat more.

Fine dinning, the atmosphere is very good. I came to celebrate my wedding anniversary with my husband. The chef will come to care about the dining situation from time to time, which is very considerate.
A must-visit place for steak and squid pasta

The service was fantastic! The food was delicious too. The prices were very reasonable! It was about half the price of a similar restaurant in Taiwan. I was so happy to dine here! It was a very special anniversary. I'll always remember this place.
Best BRUSCHETTA, simple pasta 🍝 , surprise dessert 🍨 and art gallery design 🖼️

Highly recomended!
Amazing experience in Da Nang
Very Special menú with unforgetable service.
Thanks a lot Alessio and Team

My first visit to SI Dining was excellent. Firstly the service was fantastic.
Waiters and waitresses that can engage you and know their menu.
The food I sampled was a beautiful combination of textures, flavours and unusual ingredients.
Looking into green foliage with the river in the background made the whole experience very enjoyable. I will definitely return.

Food was DELICIOUS here. We thought the food here could beat many restaurants we have been to back home in Houston. All the dishes we got were sooooo goood. The food did take a while but it was definitely worth it. We were staying at a hotel that was a 12 min Grab ride away and it was well worth the drive. Would definitely recommend this place if you’re tired of eating viet food.
Top level food, you wont find better fine dining and service in Da Nang

This is the first time I visited the restaurant because I saw it was highly rated on Google. I had a great experience here. I like the open space but there is air conditioning and lots of trees so it feels very comfortable. The food for me is generally quite tasty. The most impressive dish is the beef dish... melting in the mouth with mixed spices. The dessert is not sweet, which is my preference and especially the staff is very very cute. I went with 2 people but only ordered 1 set of wine (because I can't drink), but when they brought it up, they brought me an extra glass and invited me to have a glass. I also agreed to taste a little but I felt very delicate in the customer service of the restaurant 👍👍

Spent $2.4M vnd. Did the a la carte menu which was cute. I also drank a vinho verde bottle which was really good. Standout dish was the tom kho ravioli with broth and cheese. The bo la loc missed the mark for me because the cookery on the beef was uneven, with one portion medium rare and the other very rare.

The atmosphere is nice, the staff are friendly, and the food is delicious.
Wine pairing is also good~
This course is not recommended for those who cannot eat a lot.
I can’t eat because I’m full 😭
Great food and nice atmosphere! We tried the tasting manual, 7 dishes, all great and highly commended. The staff is very responsive, efficient and helpful. 100% must try in Danang.

Fine dine at its best. Foods taste amazing with infused local twist. Have ordered Classic set together with other Ala carte option. Service is top-notch as servers are attentive and able to speak good English. Open-air concept, dress light would be preferred . Do drop by if you want to experience fine dine in Danang!
It's delicious and clean. Nice atmosphere, but no air conditioning.
Nice choice for a leisure morning coffee

The food quality and cooking techniques are definitely Michelin-worthy. The starters, in particular, are incredibly delicious, thanks to the chef's use of authentic ingredients.

I highly recommend this restaurant.

It's a shame Google can only give it a maximum of five stars; otherwise, I'd give it six.

The atmosphere is well-designed. Although it's an open-plan space, the air conditioning above the seats keeps it from feeling stuffy. Even during dinner, there were no mosquitoes to bother us.

The front desk staff were excellent, speaking fluent English and being friendly. They explained each dish carefully. They even paid attention to every detail, from changing cutlery to pouring drinks. It was a pleasant experience.

The food was delicious.
Each dish had its own distinct flavor. The sauces were all unique; even the salad had a unique and delicious combination.

The other appetizers, the sides, the main course, and even the dessert were all excellent. It felt like I was dining at multiple restaurants at once.

My only slight regret was the steak. The first few pieces were tender and fragrant, but the last few were a bit greasy. I wonder if it was because I was too full earlier.

I won't upload photos because they don't capture the atmosphere. The presentation was beautiful, but photos don't capture the atmosphere. I recommend dining in person to truly experience it.

Italian food with a strong Vietnamese flair. The wine pairing was also good. The tableware also had a slightly Vietnamese feel to it, which was interesting.

The dress code was listed as omakase, but most people were wearing jackets or shirts.
Excellent meal last night at Si Dining. Every course hit the mark, the service was good, and the ambiance was great. Highly recommended.
Recommend their Signature

European-style food should be made and decorated very beautifully and deliciously
The appetizers are delicious and the birthday order including cake is great, 10 VND
The service staff is very good, enthusiastically asking questions about food allergies or not, or recommending dishes for users to make choices.
The atmosphere is quiet, not too noisy, suitable for dating.

A wonderful discovery, or the art of serving refined dishes with all humility. A restaurant of excellence that we can only recommend, a great team, a super kind, attentive chef... a wonderful time spent with family
Absolutely Brillant. Food was incredible and then service was Brillant. Couldn’t put anything wrong with the food or restaurant. Happily go back there any day. Well done

Fabulous meal and service, I simply couldn't ask for more. I ordered the tasting menu with wine pairing, and it was well worth every single cent. The bruschetta with smoked iberican pork belly, smoked eggplant, confit tomato and manchego was to-die-for. I love how every dish has a vietnamese twist. You know it's a proper carbonara when it doesn't any cream, and it was paired with grilled eel, which was surprisingly good, even for a non-eel eater like myself. The smoked duck breast was cooked to perfection, and the flavour was so good - it was prepared so well there wasn't any gaminess. Portions were generous. The staff are fantastic! Very genuine and attentive. Honestly, I have zero complaint, only compliments. Chef Alessio made a couple of appearances to chat and connect with the guests, which was such a nice touch. You're not gonna regret dining here at all. È tutto buonissimo!

A Tale of Italian Infatuation 🇮🇹🍴🇻🇳
• With news confirmed that the red guide will digest Da Nang for its much-anticipated 2024 edition, Si Dining may well invoke a visit.
• Inspired by Italian Chef Patron Alessio Rasom, Si Dining presents as an open air, laid back terrace style setting with an intriguing lighting-scape. The natural darkness of the terrace is buttressed with stylish table lighting, bold illumination from a kitchen centrepiece with a gorgeous, grammable green wall feature that feels like an unintentional ode to Prince Vulcan.
• Alessio offers an Italian Viet fusion style of cuisine yet we couldn’t help but fall back to his twists on the Italian classics and his pimped up cold cut platter, white asparagus, carbonara and panacotta were equally moreish & delicious.
• Sommelier Trinh’s esetoric wine suggestions were intriguing, yet I doubled down on the Antiniori Chianti Classico for that 2nd glass.
• Si, is Italian for Infatuation & Si Dining is well worth a visit for anyone planning to visit Da Nang.
Delicious, high quality, great service

Love the atmosphere at here, cosy, nice lighting, nice decorations of the place;
The foods were great, carefully prepared, attentive cookings and combination of …
Amazing view and amazing food ! I highly recommend it ! One of my new favorite restaurant in Da Nang

Delicious food, beautiful decoration, VIP room suitable for families who want private space, our group arrived at 5:30 to watch the beautiful sunset. 🤗🤗 The staff was super cute in advising on dishes. We all liked it. We will come back if we have the chance 🥰🥰 …

What a fantastic dining experience.
The food was excellent.
Congratulations to the chef and team; great service and I had a great birthday …
Green space, little traffic so quiet. Polite service, ok food, a bit high price.
Excellent restaurant, the food, the service is simply a must
Chef Alessio creates the best amalgams between Italian dishes and Vietnamese flavors. A must-visit when in Danang.
It's a great place with a nice atmosphere if you go at night.
Best Italian dining in Da Nang!
The best Italian restaurant in Danang
Definitely worth a visit! Service was impeccable, dishes were delicious and reasonably priced for the quality of ingredients!
food tasting experience 😊 …

It's a perfect restaurant
But you have to wait for the full course meal
The staff was friendly and the food was delicious
If you want the best food, atmosphere and service in Danang then Si Dining is a must. …

Wow!! What a fantastic place. Food was incredible. Honestly so delicious, and such a unique twist on some classic Italian food. Staff were delightful and it must be one of the most gorgeous venues that I've eaten at. Highly recommend for anyone looking for something memorable in the area!
Maybe capers for beef carpaccio would be good, I expected brighter flavors

A great evening here!
The staff are very friendly, pleasant and enthusiastic
I changed the table and they still happily supported me
The food was fresh and delicious, the decoration was cute
The restaurant space was airy and warm
Comfortable parking
Ke nguyen is an excellent staff, helpful and polite. We have a wonderful dinner with the delicious food. For those who come to Da Nang, I highly recommend this restautant for celebrating.

5 points to everything.
I do not write reviews very often, but in this case I must. If you are looking for a nice place to have dinner in Da Nang, then this is the place to go. It may seem that the restaurant is located in the middle of nowhere but once you get there then the atmosphere, service and of course the food will make you feel like you are  in a modern luxury restaurant. Attention to the details, very helpful staff and of course the food - Michelin-star flavours. Keep up the good work!
Blown away. Everything was excellent - service, staff, taste, decor, attention to detail. Will be back for my birthday next year

The food taste very good with a chill environment , and staffs are very nice too.
Suggested!
Perfect meal, perfect night 🌙 it was a special day thank you
good food. good service, good atmosphere

What a wonderful place to take a date or nice family dinner. The ambience and service were perfect for this fine dining. The food of course all taste what a Michelin restaurant should taste. Subtle flavor combine with freshness of seafood, lamb, and steak is absolutely wonderful. Timing is important so we love the timing for each entree to come out once we finish with the dish. Great job with the chef and staff for working together and providing one of the best experiences I’ve had in a very long time.

Just came back from dinner with my wife from this lovely establishment and could not wait to join others in sharing our dining experience. It was flat out an amazing experience all around, even compared to our dining experiences in Hong Kong. It was our last dinner in Da Nang before our departure.

Our main server was Ngoc [aka Piccola] and she was just extremely welcoming from our first step into the restaurant. She was attentative snd friendly throughout our entire evening. She explained each dish with a smile. She was awesome!

The staff welcomed us to sit on the 2nd floor where there were only two other tables and the music was a bit more tame. It was a pleasant scenery where on one side we saw some beautiful interior artwork and on the flipside was a beautiful backdrop of the city with trees and ferris wheel.

Now onto the food.. flat out amazing. We said wow at least 50 times throughout our meal. All the dishes were fantastic but the standouts where the duck and the lambchops. They blew us away with the quality of food cooked to perfection with mindblowing flavors. These two dishes, in our opinion, were equivalent to Michelin star dishes. If we had another day. We would have easily gone back again to try everything else. The plate was so clean when we finished, we cracked up laughing.

We felt the meal was really well priced for the quality of food that we had. Would give 6 stars if we can.

Thank you to the team for giving us such a dining experience to which we will definitely remember for a very long time and recommend to others as well.
Absolute best dinner we had one week into our Vietnam holiday. Can’t recommend enough. Get a Grab Taxi and go for lovely European food experience. Vegetarians will feel welcome.

its a great experience 👍🏻 the ambience is very welcoming. staff are very attentive and they know how to take care of you (and your kids - they offered off the menu kids food for them).
excellent food, every single dish we ordered was fantastic and my personal favourite is the ox tongue 😋 highly recommended!

Had the 4 course meal and every single dish was just so delicious. It’s as if we were in Italy. Chef was friendly and shared how he sourced for the best ingredients. We will definitely make this our go-to restaurant in Danang!

I had a 360 perfect experience from Si Dining!
From Pre Service offline communicating cross borders to being onsite for meals and amazing service by the entire team!!!
Phenomenal! If there was a 6* I would have rated the crew and the food and experience as that!

My special event in Danang was made extraordinarily amazing and seamless all because of 1st, the support from Queen for responding to all my relentless questions to put together an amazing evening of celebrations!

Food by owner and chef was superb! Portions were great and can you imagine, they change their menu daily based on fresh produce of the day procured

I love that they can section off the 2nd storey that has unblocked views for private events . Where mind was held and ground floor for main dining  which is also where I enjoyed my 1st dine in experience.

This restaurant team can deliver a full fledged event from Hair , make up, sound and system alongside with blooms arrangements and photography services too.
So brief them well and they can support it

Good job!
I will vivisection and dine again when I return next trip!.
This is a Michelin star experience, wow, wow, wow! From food, to service everything was amazing.  If michelin star inspector is in Da Nang, you have to try it!

The last time I came to Da Nang, I missed si dining. This time I came back, and it is my first choice restaurant. The seats in the restaurant have a sense of space, the walls are artistic, the customers are high-quality, red and white wine glasses and tableware are not reused, the service is better and more considerate, the owner is very polite, and the food is made with more care. Such high-quality restaurants must be supported. I dare say it is the best in Da Nang.

Best Italian restaurant, and among the best restaurant in the city.

The vegetarian menu is as delicious as the main one which is very appreciated.
The wine menu is filled with good selection.

The staff is very kind and helpful. They will make sure each guest feels good.
The place is beautiful with large open room and big trees.  Must do :)

If it would be possible to put 10 stars out of 5 for service, we’d do it. The host met us upon taxi’s arrival, as the restaurant is located in a distant, quiet area. Everything was excellent: the food, the service, the decorations, etc. We enjoyed it very much! Although, we were not able to book by ourselves, the confirmation needs a phone number from Vietnam or another country but not Russia, so we asked hotel stuff to book it for us, so it was not a big deal.
Still, we loved the restaurant and we recommend it if you’d like to experience top service.

Italian food is my favorite and I have had the opportunity to eat at some of the best Italian restaurants around the world, after dining at Si I would rate it in the top 1%. The overall dining experience was excellent. Let me begin with the food and my appreciation of the Chef.

The Chef prepares food in a way that leaves you understanding it’s beauty to the sight and it’s delectable to the taste. The presentation of dishes is complimented by beautiful dishes and cutlery. Each entree led my appetite to anticipate and be ready for the next enjoyable morsel. Big hats to the Chef as I could really understand his love and joy of cooking in each bite. The experience did not stop there.

The wait staff was excellent and accommodating. They clearly understood each dish, the ingredients and preparation. When asked anything they did not know they sought answers and responded with high knowledge. They were highly skilled and very supportive of my dietary needs. They even picked up on special needs of my family.

I had diner with my family of four. My two children who can be quite picky said, “except for Momma’s Si’s is the best food they have ever eaten!” To satisfy two school age children is another feat well delivered by Si.

To top everything off the overall ambience and music together with a backdrop of banana trees gave us, even with other diners around the feeling of being in a quiet private resort.

Big ups to Si. If you are looking for a great dining experience check them out.
Unreasonably overpriced. Nice service though

The meal was amazing! The food was prepared perfectly. We had the duck and fish, and each were delicious.  The purées/ sauces they make for each dish were unique.
The service was A+. They treat their guests like royalty.  We were very impressed.

Nuova Cucina is wonderful. Not only is the taste amazing, but the worldview is also wonderful. Everything from the ingredients, techniques, presentation, tableware, and interior design seems to be imbued with a delicate soul. The hospitality and demeanor of the service staff are also outstanding. You can feel the chef's good personality, not just his culinary skills.

You'll never get bored of the pure flavor and combination of ingredients, such as beetroot salad, fish of the day, smoked duck, bread, and crackers.
Food it's amazing, best quality , a must try while in Da Nang .
The attention to detail, the staff, and the food are all next level! Michelin, are you listening?

Amazing food and wine and the staff are so welcoming and friendly. We had a fantastic New Year’s Eve set menu with wine pairing, and the wine went really well with the food. The only minus would be that the glasses of wine didn’t have so much wine in them. Would have loved some more :) Otherwise, great evening and lovely place!

Food was overall great and the mortadella pizza was outstanding! Waitress introduced menu, dishes and checked on us regularly. Wine selection is decent too but could have more wines by the glass for my liking. Ambience was great too!
Si Dining is filled with flavours. I loved every dish from the restaurant :) beef carpaccio, chicken, and tuna is a must try dish!

I have good memories of coming to Vietnam.
This is a place you must definitely come back to later.
The pairing itself is perfect

I visited this restaurant with my family to celebrate our last night in Da Nang. Choosing the signature tasting menu with wine pairings was the best decision. Every  menu was unique and had sophisticated flavors. All the staff were very friendly and we had a great dining experience in a beautiful interior and elegant setting.
Fantastic restaurant, excellent service ever. Highly recommend!!!
The food and wine and the presentation thereof, and the ambiance of Si Dining are outstanding.  This little restaurant is definitely worth a visit.  What a wonderful evening!

The signature tasting menu is a beautiful meal full of subtly balanced and composed flavors. I can appreciate how chef has thoughtfully crafted each component for every plate.

The appetizer courses have a nice acidity that subtly highlights the flavors of the seafood.

The mint provides a nice bright contrast to the barracuda.

The char on the onion pairs nicely on the squid.

The olives provide the right amount of salinity to the beef cheek lasagna.

The pigeon is beautifully cooked... Although I did feel it could have used just a touch more salt.

The guava dessert is refreshing and light.

Again, there's a lot of subtlety going on demonstrating chef's fine craftsmanship.

Service was friendly. And I could see chef greeting some friends and regulars.

I enjoyed this a lot. If I lived in danang, I would also become a regular.

Don’t miss this amazing hidden gem in Da Nang. The chef is brilliant, I really appreciate how he chooses the right cheese in each dish. The service was outstanding! The beetroot salad and the duck ravioli were exceptional.

The location is top-notch, every detail is taken care of to make the most of the experience, the staff is attentive to every need offering a very professional service, despite the variety of the menu is truly everything cooked very well with high-quality ingredients, salads, pasta, main courses and finally an excellent tiramisu, you can accompany everything with excellent wines, a special applause goes to the owner Alessio who with his professionalism but at the same time humility makes you fully enjoy the experience, the best restaurant I have tried in Vietnam.

Really friendly and professional staff, they speak english and vietnamese. The Italian Chef is really creative and will surpise you. So dont hesitate to follow theirs recommandations.
Beautiful atmosphere surrounded by beautiful and not noisy. I highly recommend this place 😊
Stop searching! This is the best restaurant around. Great chilled,yet elevated,vibe. Food excellent. Great wines! Ticks all boxes.

Genuinely one of the best places I've had the pleasure of dining in. The atmosphere is a very calm intimate setting, the food was absolutely stunning, with a creative approach taken to each of the dishes provided. Hands down the best Italian food I've had, even compared to restaurants back home in Australia. The chef personally came out to greet us and see us off, which made us feel very welcome and was a pleasure to see. The rest of the staff are just as exceptional, very polite, considerate and accommodating. And the hot towels provided at the start were a very nice and very much appreciated touch.

A flawless experience from the moment you step in to the moment you leave. No question, this establishment is a must-visit for anyone in the Da Nang/Hoi An area. One of the easiest recommendations I'll have made in my entire life.

5 out of 5 for a great night out!
Great food and service, with an extensive wine list.
Definitely recommend if you are looking for a high-end dinner experience.
The owner and chef really cares about their guests.
Love this restaurant so much, all staffs are polite and friendly!! Foods are tasty and special, recommend.
Great environment, nice food and the staffs were super nice! Definitely worth to come!
My overall experience at Si Dining was perfect! The best meal I've ever had in Da Nang!

They welcomed me when I called to see if I could come in for late night small bites n drinks solo. Service was really lovely and so was the food (good latte too).
Chef said hi :)
I've been to a lot of dining restaurants in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh, but this place is also good. The food is prepared by an Italian chef, so you can enjoy it at a cheaper price than in Korea.
Exceptional service, great ambiance and high-quality food. What more can you ask for.

This place ticks all the boxes - amazing food, excellent service and it has such a beautiful atmosphere. We found this restaurant by chance whilst visiting Đà Nẵng and researching where to go. An really beautiful and well thought out menu, with the choice of a là carte or a set menu. I will definitely come back if I’m in Đà Nẵng again.
All the staff were enthusiastic and professional.

A really good dining experience at Si. Everything was perfect, from the food to the service. The chef was so kind to give us a glass of Grappa on the house, which was a pleasant surprise. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a delicious and memorable dining experience in Da Nang

We visited Da Nang from Australia 9/23 and dined at Si Dining.
I was pleasantly surprised that it wasn’t the Italian restaurant I had pictured, it was better! The decor and restaurant layout was very inviting and calming, staff were very attentive and friendly and of course the food did not disappoint!
Each dish we ordered had elements that took skill and creativity, not just ‘pizza and pasta’.
The ‘sandwich’ style pizza had us confused when it didn’t look like pizza but it was amazing and clever!
I would rate it higher than most Italian restaurants from where I am from.
Will make Si Dining our 1st stop if we get the pleasure to visit vietnam again.
Beautiful restaurant and very friendly staff.

We loved it! The food is perfect, the service is amazing. Definitely highly recommended. Great place for a gorgeous dinner :) the staff is incredibly well trained (they have a lovely cat 🥰) we just love everything there. Thank you guys, and congratulations to the great chef and owner!

At Si Dining, every plate tells a story - a reflection of the chef’s unparalleled journey. Originating from the prestigious Michelin-starred restaurants of France, the chef and his wife took a transformative bicycle expedition from France all the way to Vietnam. This wasn’t just a physical journey but an exploration of diverse cultures, flavors, and the raw essence of life itself. The couple’s decision to lay down roots in the tranquil surroundings of Da Nang is testimony to their passion for authenticity. Drawing from this wealth of experience and a dedication to the finest ingredients, from premium Greek olive oil to the fiery red pepper of Phu Quoc Island, the culinary masterpieces at Si Dining are more than just meals - they are experiences. Such depth in every dish, coupled with the chef’s rich tapestry of life experiences, more than justifies the price, offering diners an unmatched gastronomic journey.
I have dinner with some friends from Hong Kong.  Great dishes!

This is the best service i ever had in a Restaurant. The waiters notice every single detail and are very attentive. We were there two times for dinner and the food was perfect. Can recommend trying the tasting menu with wine pairing. Flavor, Looks, everything is a 10/10. The second time i had the MB3 Angus Beef which was literally the best beef i ever ate. Aside from the food, the Ambiente is really nice. You can sit outside or inside, the place is not super huge which makes the atmosphere way better. Should make a reservation before, but its 100% worth it. For this kind of service, food and experience prices are fair.
Great birthday at Si, great food, friendly professional service.
The food was amazing! One of the best places in Da Nang. And very polite and helpful staff! Well recommended!
Verry good

We didn’t know what to expect because we found the restaurant from google, and i have to say this was The best culinary experience we’ve had. Not only was The food amazingly balanced, well thought off and perfectly made. The staff was unbelievable! The attention to details, attentiveness to every need, truly brought the experience to a different level. The chef’s story is truly mirrored in the food in the most beautiful way. Thank you for the best experience we can’t wait to hopefully come back again!

This fine dining Italian restaurant offers a truly exceptional experience that sets it apart from what you would expect from a normal Italian restaurant. The restaurant's stunning design and meticulous attention to detail create a captivating ambiance. The attentive service adds to the overall luxury, making you feel truly pampered.

The wine selection, is top-notch and complements the exquisite cuisine perfectly. The melt-in-your-mouth fish sashimi is a delightful starter, and the carne salada carpaccio is a flavorful treat. The barracuda fish of the day, perfectly cooked, showcases the chef's expertise.

The pork cannelloni is a standout dish, prepared to perfection. For dessert, the guava dessert was out of this world and the homemade Nutella options are highly recommended, offering a sweet and satisfying conclusion to your meal.

Remarkably, this exceptional dining experience, complete with a glass of blue label whiskey and amaretto, all this  priced at just $95. It's an incredible value for the level of quality and luxury you receive. This restaurant is an absolute must-visit for anyone seeking a memorable Italian fine dining experience.
The views from the air-conditioning room are amazing, as well as the art hanging in the walls.
(Google doesn't let me add photos to the review)
Sorry the restaurant is only open from 5pm to 10pm

First, we ordered a course and the main dish was pigeon meat and steak.
The amuse-bouche was butter and salami spread on bread, which whetted our appetite.
I remember that fried balls with cheese were also served, which were quite delicious.
Next, the squid flavor spread in my mouth, and it felt greasy and rough, but the taste was amazing, and the greasy feeling disappeared right away when I drank sparkling water and wine.
The pasta seemed to be made of talaitelle instead of regular noodles, and the flavor was amazing.
The main dish, pigeon, had a slight pigeon flavor, but it was flavorful and juicy.
The steak was lightly seasoned, but it was great to eat with wine.
As expected of a fine dining restaurant, they brought water every time we ran out and took good care of the wine.
The plates were cleared right away, and the chef even came to greet us to ask if it was okay. Those who are worried about seeing rats and such because the surroundings are natural and it is Vietnam, it would be better to eat inside and enjoy the atmosphere and service.
The space, food and staff are all great!
It's delicious. I don't like Western food but I still eat it sometimes. The space here is quiet and clean. The few times I've been here, I've seen that most of the guests are foreigners.
It was so good. From the atmosphere to the taste of the food, it was perfect. If I were to eat this food in Korea, it would cost at least 2 to 3 times more.

Finally had the occasion to eat at Si and everything was beyond expectations. The reception and service was great. Chef Alessio came personally several times and the staff were well trained and able to recommend as well as explain all the dishes. Everything outstanding in terms of ingredients and technique but what was most interesting for me was how chef was able to incorporate local ingredients to elevate and blend the flavors in such harmony.

Fresh and high quality ingredients for a memorable dining experience with my family. Unfortunately I don’t always take pictures of the food I eat so this post will do without. Will definitely have to come back again soon.

The food is very fresh and delicious.
Professional staff.
🌟Try the freshest and most premium oysters at Si. With a combination of horseradish sauce, green apple shaved ice cream and celery, this is a light and delicate appetizer before dinner.
One of the best place for fine dining in Da Nang city. The desserts are in another level - taste them and you might feel like heaven. 1000/10

To be honest, if you say it, it's delicious ⒵┃ I'm not sure. In Vietnam, 100,000 won per person, 1 side... It's very clean, and a local restaurant would be much cheaper. ●ㅔꙔI don’t even have a conditioner. ㅔㅓ It’s hot. If you’re someone who can’t stand the heat, be careful. Γ⋌ㅔ

Alessio is an experienced chef and you can taste it in every dish. We had a wonderful experience and everything was on point. We had the chance to try many things and the balance of flavours was outstanding, an experience in which italian elements mix with a vietnamese twist that gives the perfect boost. From appetizers to desserts, 10/10. Perfect price/quality. Excellent service. We'll visit again and again, and if you are in Da Nang, you can't miss this place.
perfect place for a romantic n  fine-dinning evening! excellent foods ❤️👍

Everything here is perfect

Service Chef Meals Desserts Very Delicious
make people feel happy
Delicious food, very eye-catching, enthusiastic staff, spacious space 🥰🥰🥰 …
Delicious food, enthusiastic staff, quite romantic space
The restaurant I rate is the best quality in Da Nang, I have and will eat here many times. …
We had an incredible experience here. The service was impeccable and the food was delicious. We enjoyed the set menu with the wine pairing- highly recommend!

Order the tasting menu with the wine pairing and you will not be disappointed！

Service was really impeccable as they checked on us and asked for our preference …
Mamma Mia! Delicious!
The food is so delicious
great
Exceptional staff and service, must try as they use local produce with Italian Vietnamese fusion
The food is delicious and the atmosphere is great. I recommend going if you're traveling for an anniversary. However, it's not very refreshing.

We loved every single moment being in this place, food, atmosphere, the stuff, everything was excellent! The stuff was extremely friendly, we felt really welcomed! And food is so amazing we couldn’t stop eating even when we became super full! Highly recommended to visit 👏

It was so great. It was a bit pricey, but the quality was great, and the staff were so friendly.
It was a special day, and everyone was so helpful, making it an incredibly touching two hours.
Thank you so much for giving me unforgettable memories.
Really delicious food and cozy atmosphere. A must try. Local ingredients cooked in a fusion menu.
The food was delicious and the staff was very friendly.

Ok, this’s a long one. We had a veg salad, a scallop risotto, and, wait for this… a Kontum ‘stinky’ crab spaghetti, pairing with a rose wine bottle and a lively, slightly sparkling beautiful red bottle. The salad was truly exceptional. When was the last time someone, any one could make a salad exceptional? I couldn’t recall. The scallop risotto was absolutely stunning, I don’t have words to do it justified. “It must be a regular Best-Seller on the menu, right”? Wrong, the Chef explained that he had it on the menu here for the first time. He changes the menu daily. That’s just crazy! If you happen to see it on the menu again, jump right on it! The Kontum crab spaghetti was what “sealed the deal” for me. It wasn’t the most delicious dish_ that title went to the risotto. ‘Stinky’ crab was a little known delicacy of minority highlanders in nearby Kontum, very obscured because of ethno-geographic reasons and its well …, ‘stinky’ smell. Even I only heard of it but never have tried before. To combine that to an asian dish was tough enough, let alone a western one but it came out really cool. You still need to work on the smell a little bit though to enjoy it. So like durian or certain cheeses, I doubt it will be a regular item for everyone. But I had so much fun tasting it and will recommend it to any adventurous
foodies out there. And that added a really nice touch to what I really love here overall. Not only he’s so talented and serious in his work, but he’s also very daring, very fun in his creativity, and everything came out in high standard. You’ll see it everywhere from the first greetings when you step into this place. Next time if you’re in Da Nang,  give yourself a treat here. Oh, and the red bottle was ‘La Monella’.  ;-)

This is the best restaurant in Danang. The fusion food is very fresh and delicious with the extremely attentive service of the staff, and the space surrounded by green fresh garden . A place wonderful worth a visit

i had dinner here with my family, the space is fresh with many green trees, what impressed me the most is that the menu here is changed every day, the food here is delicious, the service is outstanding. A wonderful experience in Da Nang cannot be missed
Nice desserts, nice dishes, friendly chef and staff

Haven't tried the afternoon dishes but enjoyed the morning coffee many times. Nice space, the fruit juices are quite delicious but there are not many choices. The service attitude is very good, quick and polite

Spectacular food and service.
Order to share and try as many dishes as you can.
Best Fine dining restaurant in Da Nang...by far!!

Thanks Alessio!!!
This is a surprise find in Da Nang, the food is amazing, a modern twist to traditional Italian dishes - the staff and Chef is also very warm and friendly

The food was splendid, there are not enough words that can express the amount of detail and flavor in the meal. The meal was more than just a meal, it was art and a masterpiece. The service and atmosphere were above and beyond. This restaurant painted me a new and more broad picture of Italian cuisine.

Si Dining is a superlative experience of all around fine dining, in terms of food, service, and ambiance. Cannot find flaws. Not cheap compared to local prices, but perfectly in line with the overall quality.
Blew my socks off! So so good! Fusion at its finest in a great setting, highly recommend to anyone
A really nicely decorated restaurant and the most delicious food. Definitely must go if you’re in the area.

Google search nearby Italian restaurants and call to make reservations. Beautiful environment, attentive service, fresh ingredients, from appetizers to main dishes, the chef came out to introduce the source of ingredients and their cooking specialties, and the food combinations were very promising, giving our taste buds a valuable lesson. The price is not expensive, and it is really cheap compared to Hong Kong. Teammate Bread Beast was ecstatic when he ate the sourdough bread, and asked if he could take a whole bowl of takeaway back to the hotel😂
We toasted and sang birthday songs to our teammate at the beginning, and the restaurant staff quietly prepared a surprise for her, sending her a blessing dessert, and the chef also came out to see us off😊, this dinner was really perfect🎉
We are so so happy in dinning here, the chef and all staff are very nice and good service. All food are fresh, taste are so good and excellent
Amazing service, delicious food

Great place for French or super high class. For me the local of danang i cant buy the cheese plate, but the people who love fine wines and imported French items should go and enjoy it. It has a lovely location with an awesome staff, Anh was amazing to us, and im sure the food will follow ... Im just a poor foreigner so i cant compare it. If you like french foods or imported everything this is the nice atmosphere with excellent service place to be. Enjoy it. 😉😉
Good food take time.

I chose Si Dining for my girlfriend and I's special date and everything was great. The delicious food, the space and the care of the staff made our date memorable 🥺 Thank you Si team and wish the restaurant more and more development 🧡
Had very nice vegetarian Italian food. Friend had marriage anniversary. Made evening pleasant.

The pasta is under expected.
Other dishes is nice.
Staff is nice and well trained
The atmosphere is great for dine in the evening

On the last day of our trip to Da Nang, I took my mom there, and she chose dinner at SiDining as her most memorable moment in Da Nang!
We ordered a course meal, including appetizers and dessert, for 1,550 won per person, plus a wine pairing for 720 won. At around 120,000 won per person, it's a bit steep, but after trying it myself, I think you'd have to pay 2-2.5 times that amount in Korea to justify it. I can't forget the delicious food in this wonderful restaurant, and my mom said it was like a dream come true! They paired the food with wine, and even though I'm not a wine expert, it was delicious. The chef came and explained the dishes to me, and I could feel his sincerity. Both my mom and I loved it. Make wonderful memories at SiDining in Da Nang on your special day! Even if you're not in a course meal, they also have a variety of a la carte options, with many dishes priced from 10,000 to 30,000 won, so feel free to stop by!
The staff were all incredibly friendly!
All the food was excellent, especially the lamb dish, with a texture and sauce I'd never experienced before...
Best restaurant and awesome european food style
Excellent food ... the prices are high ... it's a bit expensive
Delicious food, a combination of Asia and Europe, unique. The staff is very friendly, attentive and knowledgeable, very few other places in Da Nang are like this. Open space, green, isolated
I had an awesome dinner, especially the lamb was super great, strongly recommend for anyone who wants to try best lamb with mint. Wine and dessert were so delightful as well.

Si Dining is definitely one of the best restaurant that we had visited in Da Nang City.

The staffs are all so approachable and always making sure that you are enjoying your moments dining at their restaurants.

The menu changes regularly so I don’t see a point of elaborating much of the menu. However, the food are well thought out and served in a very elegant way and unpretentious.

For those having restricted dietary, need not to worry. You can always ask the restaurant in advanced to get your menu customised to your needs and concerns.

And also I would like to thank the team for a surprised birthday desserts. A simple but yet a powerful red velvet cake and the staff sing the birthday song for me unknowingly.

I am so grateful for the effort that the team has done to us. Hopefully I can visit them again some time on our next visit.

Forza Si Dining!

The atmosphere is really good!! But I wonder if there is no air conditioning... They only have a fan... It was so hot even at 8pm that I couldn't enjoy the course meal at all. And there is no boundary between the inside and outside, so the smell of cigarettes smoked outside comes right in. There may be differences in taste, but I only tasted two dishes (I asked them to leave out cilantro, but they forgot and when I asked again, they took out the fish dish first. If you don't like cilantro, be sure to check this out) If you are looking for a fine dining experience with just an atmosphere, I recommend it!! If you want less sweet and sour lime juice, definitely order it:))

We had such an amazing night at Si restaurant. It was my partner's 30th and they made the whole night extremely special. The tasting menu was out of this world and the service matched it. Easily the best fine dining in Da Nang!
The restaurant amazed me with its exquisite dishes and excellent service. The prices correspond to the quality and presentation of the dishes. I highly recommend it👍 …
Incredible dining experience at Si Dining and definitely the best meal we had on our trip. Casual relaxed setting with food cooked to perfection and extremely reasonably priced for the quality.

We enjoyed a wonderful dinner here in a romantic atmosphere. The staff is very friendly and enthusiastic💕💕. All the dishes have unique flavors that really impressed me. I will definitely come back next time 🫶🏻🫶🏻

Exceptional Italian restaurant which uses only the freshest ingredients in their day to day menu. Its perfect for all occasions, from couples to family dinners. A must try if you are visiting Da Nang or living there.

This is not a place worth coming to Vietnam to eat at. Fine dining? Not at all.. I went there with high expectations based on numerous recommendations, but the food quality was not that great. I had the wine pairing and the Tasty Course, but the portions were so big that I was full.. I could have given a little more, but I wish they would have raised the food quality a little.. And the prices went up again. The staff was friendly.

This is the place to be if you like gourmet food in a beautiful designed ambience. You can choose between a set menu or a la carte. The service is very friendly and attentive. They introduce the dished and how you will get it served. Gin and tonic was served in a nice highball glass and the mixture was well-adjusted.

I came to Si Dining many times with my whole family, with my friends. Every time in Si Dining, we all feel totally amazed by wonderful Italian cuisines combining with Vietnamese ingredients , great wines list and wonderful hospitality. The master Italian chef did a wonderful job to bring the dining in town to a next level!! Highly recommend for anyone would like to dine well and drink well!!

It’s was a great experience when I dine here. Cozy restaurant with nice tunes and excellent dishes. Beside, the service was amazing and made me feel completely comfortable. I think it would be my new favorite spot for the dining 💯
Delicious food, very attentive staff, very cool green space
One word AMAZING FOOD THANK YOU VERY VERY VERY MUCH
Happy
Enjoyed many times with different experience. I rarely find same disc every time I come back. The menu is kept innovative. Alessio is amazing chef.
Good food and amazing   service My and Anh gave us a great service .Would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for good food in Dananag

Excellent service by a group of very professional staff! My best experience to-date in Da Nang.

Food was well executed, quite creative and differentiated. Definitely worth a visit if you’re in Da Nang and struggling with where to eat/ needs non-local cuisine.
Great atmosphere, superb service, friendly, attentive staff, and fantastic food. My favorite restaurant 🥰

This was my first time in Vietnam. I was looking for dinner in Da Nang and made a reservation after reading reviews and social media.
As everyone said, the staff were very kind. (The dining manager in particular was incredibly helpful.)
It's a popular restaurant, so it's best to make a reservation. I used a translation app and made a reservation through Google chat, and there were no problems. On the day, I ordered in my poor English, but they understood what I meant and I was very satisfied!
If you're ever in Da Nang, be sure to give it a try!

So glad to have come to know about this gem of a restaurant. The food was excellent, service was very warm and knowledgeable and interior/exterior of the restaurant was just beautiful! In the short time I have been in Da Nang, the restaurant appears to have perhaps the best wine listing I have seen. Highly recommend and will definitely be returning

Italian restaurant. but This place feels definitely Vietnam. they will recommend you  seasonal and seafood around here. however their favorite Apatizer is beef meet carpaccio. So nice! Breaded and fried Iberian pork was soft and testy! staffs also nice. It was great dinner!

It was my girlfriend's birthday and somehow the waitress realized that. So they surprised us with an additional super delicious dessert. Generally the whole service was great and encountered us with a huge smile in their face. We had a very great evening and we are very thankful for that.

It's a fantastic choice for western food in Da Nang. The staff were very friendly and they did their best to give good service. We were 4 people and the food was good overall. The staff did a fantastic job and they offered some extra treet since we were celebrating a birthday.

My dish was pasta ( paccheri ) amatriciana. I think the chef might be Italian but honestly I was a bit disappointed with the amatriciana since it was very sweet and it was basically pasta with some pancetta ( not guanciale ) and mixed with onions and some tomato.

Amatriciana is supposed to be a tomato sauce. ( Not an onion mixture with some pieces of tomato ) Onions are not common in this dish in Italy but it do exist, however it's never sweet like mine was. The sauteed onions can be nice but it took over and the sweetness was too sharp. You can see the picture of my dish and compare to any other picture of a plate of amatriciana online and you can understand what I mean.

Every other dish we had was very good and the kitchen did a wonderful job. It might be advisable to write on the menu that the shrimp pasta has shrimp tartar ( raw shrimp ). Beef carpaccio very good as well as the octopus.

I know restaurants want to earn money ( I've worked in a kitchen since 16 years back ) but when I asked for "normal water" or still water from a machine they said they serve water from bottles ( which obviously are more expensive ). We finished 3 bottles which were 60K each. At the end of our dinner however they served us free water without us asking for it from a jug so not sure why I couldn't get this free water from the start ?

Just small things I personally think can improve or be more clear but overall a wonderful experience and it's a very good choice to come here for a dinner.
We had birthday dinner for my niece, on April 22nd, the food is superb, and ambience is really nice, makes you want to stay longer. One of Da Nang's best.
The atmosphere is great, but the food is so disappointing

I really enjoyed dinning here and would recommend this place if you want to try fine dinning and good Italian food! The chef and staffs were really attentive and friendly. Even though there were slight delay in serving our food due to a large group of guest who arrived after us, the staffs and chefs personally apologised to the customers and us! I would also recommend coming down earlier as when we arrived we had ordered some dishes such as the fish but it was sold out of the day! So highly recommend to visit earlier! But the food, level of attentiveness and the interaction we had with the chef made the whole experience really good!
They also accommodated to the birthday requests such as the cake and birthday song which was very pleasant!
I would recommend the set menu if you are visiting as I enjoyed every dish in it! The duck pasta was my favourite!
Possibly the best food we have eaten for several years. The taster menu is proper cooking and at least half the price you would pay for food of this standard in London. 5 stars doesn't do it justice.

I should have ordered a course meal here, but I didn't have time, so I ordered individually. The steak is about 100,000 won, so it's really expensive. It's Vietnamese food. And it takes a long time. It would be better if you come here with someone who can eat slowly. The steak was tender. It's the kind of food you can get for about 50,000-60,000 won in Korea. If you want to come to a nice place for a meal, I recommend ordering a course meal.
Refined cuisine, enchanting location, prices in line with the quality and skill of the chef. Excellent experience, to try 😀 …
