On our last evening of our holiday in Vietnam, I brought my wife, and one year old son, as a treat for her birthday to Si, not knowing anything about the restaurant.

It was exceptional. The service, the food, the ambience. Amazing capstone meal to our Vietnam experience.
We never thought one of our most memorable Italian dining experiences would be in De Nang, Vietnam. Si was exceptional, along with the kind staff and welcoming Chef Alessio. Grazi!
We had a lovely evening there and the food was delicious!
Good environment, good service and good food

The whole experience was just beautiful. Truthfully, I underestimated the place as it wasn’t the same as the photos when I googled the place, as it was more smaller and it was like in middle of nowhere. But from the moment we walked in, the …

It's surprising that a fine dining restaurant like this opens in Da Nang. It's a place you won't regret even if you try hard to find it. All menu items are of high quality, but the steak is especially delicious. The tasting menu is said to change slightly every day. Everyone is friendly, from the staff to the chef... especially the manager Trinh is very friendly and kind.

Fine, flavorful, and refined cuisine. A constantly renewed cuisine that combines the flavors of Vietnam with those of Europe. I have rarely tasted dishes prepared with such intelligence. It comes at a cost compared to classic Vietnamese restaurants, but the taste experience is worth the detour. Bravo Alessio, a great, adorable, and attentive chef. All this in a peaceful setting. Top-notch service. I recommend it 100%. Thanks Alessio
Beautiful, fresh, modern Italian dishes from Alessio with a very reasoanble, extensive wine list.

We ate there on Valentine's Day 2023. The food was very good. Started with a pizza ripieno with Mortadella and manchego. For the main we had pumpkin ravioli and squid pasta and a tiramisu for dessert. Everything was delicious. If you want to spend one evening escaping the Asian cuisine we can recommend going there and having a lovely Italian night.

One of the best places for dining in the city. Great services with well trained staff, amazing food with creativity, nice atmosphere with garden. Delicious flavor mixed Italian and Vietnamese ingredients.
Price was a little bit high but it was okay for us.
Highly recommend!
Beauty drinks, beautiful space. Price is a bit high.

There are more stores that I want to visit when I come to Da Nang again 😁
The atmosphere of the restaurant is reminiscent of a part of Bali. Many of the dishes I tasted were new to me, which made my eating experience even better😄 …
The art of italian cuisine ✨

Best restaurants in town! Beautiful and romantic location, services 5 stars, incredible creativity on the plate! Michelin star food! One word... Amazing!
Highly recommended to spend a wonderful dinner!
Great food & fresh, always!
The food was really delicious and the service was good, but it was a bit cold so I was shiveringㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ I think I need to check the weather before I go~
The price is high, but the taste, quantity, and quality of the food are all good. In Korea, you have to pay more than double to get this quality.
Visited here our last day in Danang, great experience awesome food and wine, service is very good. Totally recommend it

Signature course + 3 glasses of wine pairing for 2 people, 45 million dong.
I enjoyed unexpectedly high-quality dining in Da Nang at half the price of Korea.

The evening atmosphere was good
The food was better than anything else.
The service was also friendly.

Great dinner with boyfriend at Si dining. Beautiful atmosphere, attentive service and amazing food. Staff are very friendly and introducing all the menu in details – Tenderloin steak was cooked to perfection, best steak I have ever tasted.
Higly reccomended this place!

Recommended for dinner on the last day of your Danang trip!
It's quieter than other crowded and hectic restaurants, and the food is clean and delicious!
It's a bit expensive compared to other restaurants, but I recommend it to those who are tired of pho and want to spend some quiet time with their loved ones!
I especially highly recommend the tenderloin steak🤤
Here is a good restaurant
Incredible dinning experience by a passionate chef and his crew! Keep up the great work!
Fantastic service, great flavours perfectly balanced with fresh ingredients. Really good. Gonna have to return and try other dishes. Thank you Chef.
Very nice food.  Good service.
Quaint restaurant with comfortable yet eclectic atmosphere. Excellent food, where dish was well done.  Service was excellent, attentive and informative.

I have to say, I enjoyed every single bite of the meal in Si Dining.
The ambiance is very welcoming, upon arrival there is a guy open the car door and usher us reception.

Excellent food. Menu is extensive and seasonal to a particularly high standard. I browse through online menu prior visiting to decide on lobster, however the menu on that day did not have it.
After checking with waitress, the chef didn't find any good lobster on that day and removed from menu.
That is some quality assurance from high standard chef right that.

Have to mention the food presentation is beautiful and the taste is amazing. Pork dish is succulent and probably the best I had so far.

Highly recommend and will be back if have the chance.

Entering Sĩ Dining is like taking a break from the costal city to DaNang to be teleported to a restaurant with class, style, service that of New York or LA.   The staff are knowledgeable and attentive, the chef is the best in the city, and I need to keep going back for more and more.  Absolutely fantastic.
Everything here is so good, and so expensive for local residents 😀
I experienced a different taste. It was really delicious.
Very good food. Friendly staff. 10 points
Everything was really good!!!
The food, ambience, atmosphere, view were exceptional. You can taste the top notch quality from the food. Its quiet surrounding is a great hide away spot from the noisy city.
Wonderful restaurant, staff, owner, and chef, super attentive throughout, exquisite food, and a 10/10 presentation. Thank you very much for everything, we hope everything goes great for you 🙏🏻 …

Wow, I went there alone for dinner, and the atmosphere was really nice. I was so grateful for the excellent service from each and every staff member. I was so touched by the meticulous attention to detail from everyone in the restaurant. It's located about 60,000 dong from the city center. When I got off the Grab, the security guard opened the car door and welcomed me. Today, I really wanted wine, not food, so the staff member recommended a white wine that Koreans would enjoy. Wow, it was so delicious, I was so touched. I really didn't have an appetite, so they gave me a cheese platter and three slices of bread to dip in honey. The chef came out midway through and said hello. It was just like a scene from a movie! I also ordered tuna sashimi, and it was generous. And maybe persimmon?! I don't know for sure, but something sweet went well with the tuna sashimi. Wow, it was amazing! I felt like I was eating food. I highly recommend this restaurant! The recommended wine was just my taste, so I went there to refresh myself.
Best foods and wines in town 👍 …

Superb service and delicious food!
the only room for improvement is portion size.

still, highly recommended.
Exceptional restaurant. Staff are amazing. Chef is outstanding. Food is so, so good. Definitely recommend this restaurant.
Been living in Vietnam for over 6years and this restaurant is by far the best experience I've visited. Passionate chef and exquisite courses. Spicy tuna is a must try!! Highly recommended!!
The food is delicious and the service is the best.

English follows
This was the best restaurant I visited during my trip to Vietnam.
A friend recommended this restaurant to me. Even when I contacted them for a reservation on the same day, they immediately returned my message and the reservation went smoothly. The restaurant has a wonderful interior ambiance. The food is all very good, I have traveled to Ho Chi Minh City and Da Nang and this is the best food I have had in all of Vietnam!
The service from the staff is also excellent. I will definitely use this restaurant again when I come back to Da Nang. Thank you!

This was the best restaurant I visited during my trip to Vietnam.
A friend recommended this restaurant to me. Even when I contacted them for a reservation on the same day, they immediately returned my message and the reservation went smoothly. The restaurant has a wonderful interior ambiance. The food is all very good, I have traveled to Ho Chi Minh City and Da Nang and this is the best food I have had in all of Vietnam!
The service from the staff is also excellent. I will definitely use this restaurant again when I come back to Da Nang. Thank you!

We had the pleasure of having Chef Thien Tuong and his team cater for us at a corporate event. The food and service was excellent and made our event memorable. The whole team was very kind, hospitable and detail oriented. Highly recommend.

Exceptionally good food, service and ambience. Certainly one of the best meals I’ve had in Vietnam, let alone Da Nang, in a very long time. Innovative Mediterranean dishes with an occasional twist of Vietnamese cuisine using fresh and seasonal ingredients with a brilliant wine list to match.

I had Wagyu beef tartare for a starter, and squid and Iberian pork for the main course. The Wagyu beef tartare was the best I've ever tasted. The staff were very welcoming, and I'd like to come back to this restaurant.

Reviewer_name: Nhật Tân Huỳnh (Quà tặng và In ấn)
Review_text: Green trees, great air. Good drinks

Cheat tip:  the Prunotto "Mompertone" Monferrato on the wine list is a house pour but it is better than any house pour that I have had. Good value for money choice.  Other than this, the food is as good as other reviews have mentioned.  The five star is well deserved.
Great experience to explore this place 😀 not so many Vietnamese know to come here. Fine dining, like tasting style, unique 👌 and I will introduce my friends to come when they travel DN.

A rare authentic Italian restaurant in Da Nang. The chef is excellent at combining local ingredients into Italian dishes. There is a daily menu depending on the ingredients and inspiration of the chef. Not many restaurants dare to serve Tasting dining style in this city like SI!
Good Italian food, knowledgeable staff

My family and I were very impressed with the atmosphere, especially the amazing food and service!! I don't think I can find a better restaurant in Da Nang other than Si Dining. A lovely place that offers everything from casual breakfast to a fancy dinner. Definitely a must visit!
Steak is delicious
Amazing new addition to Da Nang. Exactly what was missing. Love the design and lighting. Very cozy romantic setting with professional staff and tasty dishes. Will be back!
tasty
I love all the food here!!!!

Cool place
Delicious coffee
Lovely staff
Reasonable price for the size

Fresh and healthy food, really nice and cozy place that i enjoy breakfast and dinner with my family. I also surprised that the price are so reasonale for such quality dishies. Will be the place i mostly come when i travel to Da Nang.
Exquisite dining! Wonderfully romantic atmosphere. Had great time.

luke-warm beer, scant tempura filled with cole-slaw, room temperature carpaccio, stale bread stick, poorly executed fig dessert. for what it was, very expensive. Despite Google says it was busy, I was the only guest. Disappointed, little value for the money, will not be back

Really nice place to have dinner with friends or family.
The foods are very creative & of course super tasty.
Nice service ! Good food.
Highly recommended ❤️
Friendly service and great food! Highly recommended
Highly recommended! Excellent Caprese! Must try!
Excellent food and atmosphere.

Da Nang doesn't have too many high quality Italian restaurants. Si is a welcome exception. The interior is tasteful and classy. Service is good and friendly. Best of all however is the food. We were first time visitors and had beef carpaccio and squid as starters. Both dishes were excellent. My main course was beef ravioli which was simply fantastic. My desert (lemon on lemon) was creative (lemon tartlett, warm lemon cream and sorbet) and very good. If there is anything to improve than I would recommend a more intense taste in the sorbet which was a bit neutral. But this is minor compared to the overall performance. The espresso was a perfect finale . As my wife didn't feel hungry I cannot describe more dishes but we will find out with our next visits.
Interesting place located in the middle of nowhere. Seems to be a good choice for a fancy dinner, private party or a few glasses of wine or cocktail.
Amazing place, beautifull deco, really cool art work from local artist Thành Chí Trần, excellent service and very good breakfast, cant wait to come for dinner, a must try in Da nang.
Amazing.
Talented chef! Amazing food. Same chef for Lim Dining in Hoi An- also good place to go!
European dishes are quite delicious and strange. Attentive and friendly service.

The best fine dinning restaurant in Da Nang. Period.

From the atmosphere to the service and the food, everything was exceptional. Shout out to Thuy for being super attentive & nice to us.

This newly opened restaurant was a delightful surprise.  Went with family and were lucky to get a table. Delicious food and very friendly staff. The chef even came to our table to explain the menu. Will definitely visit when I come to Danang next time.

Great dinner with my daughter and wife at Si. A newly opened Italian restaurant for fine dining. We ordered lamb and pumkin tortelli. The dishes are well presented and deliciuous. Staff are friendly, knowledgeable, introducing the menu in details. Service is outstanding. Got a chance to meet and have a photo with the chef. It was amazing. Highly recommended!
Great space with harmonious green trees, poetic sunset view. Friendly and enthusiastic chef, authentic Italian dishes.

New place at Đà Nẵng, evething were so lovely, run by a talent Chef Alessio and big support from passionated team.

They was surprises us with the fusion foods Vietnamese touch.
Highly recommend for you, who wanna have a fabulous dinner with a lot of love and care❤.

Lovely place with eclectic vibe. Pleasant lounge music and exceptional fusion culinary  creations. Every dish was beautifully presented , the ingredients were fresh and complimented each other to perfection resulting in a symphony of flavours.
The service was excellent. We got the recommendation from the manager in our hotel (thank you Michael!) and we greatly enjoyed it.

Delicious food in a beautiful atmosphere.
Price-performance rating top.

One of my favourite Italian restaurants in town. I have to say the chef is really talented and all the food are well done. The restaurant is located at a quiet place next to the river and has really amazing sunset view. I came to eat with my family for Mother’s Day. The food definitely made my day. Highly recommended.

One of my favorite restaurants in Da Nang.
Nice place with river view, very friendly staff and boss.
And the food is outstanding.

The food is delicious, and the portion is quite large, so you can eat until you are full. The menu also changes regularly, creatively, combining seasonal foods and Vietnamese spices, very wonderful.
The restaurant's location is quite beautiful, right on the riverbank overlooking the Asian park
The staff is professional, attentive, nothing to complain about.

Chef Alessio is one of the most passionate and talented people I have met. It really shows up in his food, and just the overall experience of dining at his restaurants. I'm so thankful he chooses to bless the city of Da Nang with his talents. Just one more reason why this is the most livable city in Vietnam.
The food is very delicious and the atmosphere  of the place is very comfortable. The staff is not only very dedicated but also attentive ❤❤❤

Chef Alessio Rasom is back with the long anticipated Si Dining and Sweet, sea to table, farm to table, the freshest catch of the day with minimalist preparation.

No meal is ever the same as dishes change with what’s available in the markets that day.

What more could you ask for?

Simply excellence. Perfection.

Hey guys…. Let’s go to Si Restaurant in Danang! Now you know why.

cute restaurant and delicious italian food
The owner must have a sophisticated style to create a restaurant with such cute decoration.
It would be great to have a party or celebration here.
The dishes are mixed between Italian and Vietnamese styles. The chef will personally select the ingredients to create each excellent dish. Lets come and chill !!

A nice restaurant

Everything was great!

A great space for family or to receive guests.
Delicious beef, fish, and dessert dishes. You should come to experience it. Next time I will come again

Super beautiful riverside view. The Italian chef's dishes are so delicious that they should be on the table. Delicious "armpit-aching" cheese beef
Pizza is delicious and great for Italian food lovers. After eating 2 dishes, I'm full... Great
We arrived the restaurant at around 3:00pm for lunch. The staff are nice and friendly to serve. The food are surprisingly good especially the pho with Australia beef and Bun Cha Hà Nội

If anyone is looking for a delicious restaurant in Da Nang, Kim Kitchen is definitely a name that cannot be missed. The first time I visited the restaurant, I was quite impressed by the neat, cozy and clean space, feeling very close like eating at home. The restaurant is not too fussy in the way it is decorated but brings comfort and ease to diners. 

Regarding the food, it must be said that it is delicious and suitable for the taste. The dishes are seasoned well, rich, keeping the traditional flavor. In particular, the rustic dishes are carefully prepared, the ingredients are fresh and eye-catching. I ordered a few dishes to try, and all of them were "satisfactory". Compared to the general level, the prices here are very reasonable, worthy of the quality received. 

Another big plus is the service: the staff are friendly, agile, always welcoming to customers. Thanks to that, the dining experience becomes much more pleasant. 

In short, Kim Kitchen is a restaurant worth saving on the list when coming to Da Nang. Delicious, reasonably priced, and with a comfortable atmosphere – the perfect “eat well, have fun, and remember forever” standard. Anyone who comes to Da Nang often should try it once.
A nice place. I was passing by and decided to charge my phone and grab a bite to eat. The seafood rice was delicious. But I especially liked the vegetable detox juices.

Kim is a great Vietnamese restaurant conveniently located just 1–2 minutes’ walk from the Crowne Plaza Danang City Centre by IHG — perfect if you’re staying at the hotel like I was. The dipping sauce here is delicious and not as strong-smelling as many other places, making it perfect for enjoying with fresh rolls. The staff speak English, which makes ordering easy. They accept credit cards (with a 3% service fee), and the restroom is clean. I came with two friends, and we ordered four dishes in total — everything was tasty and filling. Highly recommended!

I had pork skewers to wrap in rice paper and my boyfriend had the steak and egg. My pork was extremely dry and on a chopstick so no lemongrass flavour. The pork itself seemed to have zero herbs or seasoning. The rest of the plate was a decent selection of fillings for the roll. My boyfriend's steak was rare and not even a steak as pictured but basically stir fry beef. His fried eggs were overcooked and dry.

To be fair to the girl serving us - Nany - she recognised that I was not happy with the food and asked me if I was ok. I explained that the meat was dry and she took it back to the kitchen. They returned it to me with freshly cooked sticks but still they were dry and flavourless.

BẾP KIM – Kim Restaurant and Coffee is hands down one of the best dining experiences I’ve had in Vietnam! From the moment we stepped in, we were welcomed with warm hospitality, a beautiful atmosphere, and the aroma of freshly prepared, authentic Vietnamese food.

The dishes are bursting with flavor – every bite is a perfect balance of traditional recipes and modern finesse. Whether you’re trying the grilled meats, fresh spring rolls, or their signature coffee drinks, everything is crafted with love and high-quality ingredients. Even the smallest details are thoughtfully curated – from the presentation of the dishes to the cleanliness and comfort of the space.

The owners and staff go above and beyond to make you feel at home. They speak multiple languages, and their passion for great food and customer care shines through in everything they do.

If you’re in Da Nang and want a taste of true Vietnamese cuisine in a relaxed, stylish setting – BẾP KIM is an absolute must-visit. We’ll definitely be coming back. Highly recommended!

I accidentally came to this restaurant and got stuck here because the food is delicious but too cheap compared to the quality. The service staff is very polite and gentle. The restaurant specializes in selling family rice dishes and some traditional dishes such as snail noodles, spring rolls...etc
In general, the shop has a well-thought-out investment. I really like it and I will definitely come back many more times.

I went out to drink coffee with my baby in front of the hotel and ate rice noodles and fried spring rolls. It was really delicious.

However, communication with the female employee taking menu orders was not smooth. It was so delicious that I asked for 2 bowls of rice noodles and 2 fried spring rolls to be packaged to take back to the hotel. I checked twice and ended up getting 3 packages.

It was heavy so I was worried about how to carry it, but the owner saw it and thanked me so much, he assigned a staff member to help me carry it to the hotel. Best💓
Food is really tasty and staff so nice. If you visit Da Nang you must come to try

The food is good and fresh. We had ordered an Australian beef noodle and spring rolls. All the ingredients were great. I was quite surprised when the staff there told me this was a newly-opened restaurant. We do enjoy the food a lot as well as atmosphere - full of beautiful greenery and Vietnamese decoration. And of course, the staff were all nice to us.

An incredible establishment. Excellent staff and a secluded atmosphere. But the most amazing thing is that I had the most delicious pork of my life here. I ordered pork with egg and rice. It was indescribable. The pork melted into fibres on my tongue. The soy sauce was very meaty and the rice was perfectly cooked. After that, I thought about that pork all day. And I came back the next morning right away. The prices here are also fantastic! I highly recommend it to everyone.
Really good cuisine and great service

The interior is neat and clean.
However, there were so many ants crawling around on the tables while I was eating.
The staff tried their best to provide excellent service, but the hygiene was disappointing. Also, since we were the first customers in the restaurant, they only turned on the fan then... The wind was so strong that the rice paper container kept falling over. (It seemed like there was no air conditioning.)
And the banh xeo was so greasy.

We only visited because our accommodation was nearby, but I don't think we'd go there on purpose.

This is about a block away from the new Duy Tan University tower where I teach (across from the Da Nang City Administrative Centre).

Stopped in for lunch because the menu at the entrance showed many intriguing options.

I chose the beef stew with bread and a pineapple drink. Everything was delicious. The staff was pleasant and engaging. The atmosphere was inviting. I will return.
Really tasty Vietnamese food! Probably the best Pho I’ve eaten. Staff were very friendly and welcoming. Really nice and cosy atmosphere. 100% recommend to visit when you are in Da Nang!
It's delicious, the environment is clean and beautiful, and the waiters are very friendly.

Nice little restaurant, easy to reach on foot. We just checked into the hotel and were looking for a quick snack and came across this restaurant through Google Maps. Beautifully comfortably furnished, incredibly friendly staff, and a large selection of dishes on the menu. I chose the vegan summer rolls, they were really delicious, three pieces filled me up. I also had a detox juice, which I get a ten out of ten for. With the meal there was cold jasmine tea, which you get free of charge. We can only recommend the store, feel free to stop by if you're in the area!

A nice little restaurant that we found via Google Maps. After we entered the restaurant, we were able to place our order straight away. Cold tea is available free of charge and is constantly refilled. The food was very tasty and the service was very friendly. If you're already in the area, you're welcome to try it out. A new one out of ten for me.
The meal was delicious! It's great for a clean meal! If you stay at Bay Capital, you can probably eat here.

The waiters were very attentive, always attentive to requests and providing helpful recommendations. The food was delicious, the air conditioning was available, and the drinks were great. Recommended!
The staff is very friendly and the food is very delicious. Good~~
Delicious Vietnamese cuisine
Service, quality, taste.. everything is outstanding!
Great service and great food , the price is also reasonable. And the plating is nice for take a pic 🤳🏼 💯
I've eaten here several times. Very good food and service.

The staff spoke English well, so communication was easy, and the food was delicious. I was very satisfied with everything, but it was so, so hot... I ate really quickly, sweating profusely... It was hotter indoors than outdoors... I wanted to go again, but I wasn't confident...

It's a very nice restaurant. The staff is very helpful. It's very modern with classic Vietnamese food. There are also vegan options on the menu. Smoothie Detox 1 without sugar is very tasty and beautifully prepared!

Found this place while we were wandering around the area and so glad we did! The portions were great, food was tasty and the servers were so friendly 😇 if you're in Da Nang I would definitely recommend coming in!
Good meal!! Delicious! Good price!Good services!
Good restaurant. Delicious food and good price.

I found a great restaurant near my hotel on Google. This was the best value for money restaurant I've ever been to during my 5th day in Danang. I was very satisfied with all the food and drinks I ordered. After paying the bill, I couldn't believe how good it was. Next time I'm in Danang, I'll definitely go back. The service was very friendly, and the environment is perfect for a quick check-in. I hope more tourists visit this restaurant...

I really recommend this place!!!! You should definitely go there twice!
I just Googled and found a nearby place with good reviews,
but first, the atmosphere is so refreshing and nice!
Second, the menu items are all affordable! Restaurants popular among Koreans are all pricier than I thought and just so-so.
Third, the staff are so friendly!
I want to keep it to myself, but since it's not very crowded, I'm afraid it might close, so I'm writing a review.
I had the bun cha and spring rolls, and both were absolutely recommended.
I went there with no expectations, but this restaurant is truly memorable!!!

While staying at the Bay Capital Hotel, it was hot and I didn't want to venture far, so I Googled the closest restaurant and found this one!
The atmosphere was quiet and friendly, which was perfect!
Of course, the food was delicious! And most importantly, the air conditioning!!
The bun cha stayed fluffy from the moment I left the hotel until I returned, which was incredibly satisfying!!!!!!!!
Highly recommended!

Really nice restaurant with good prices. Also the owner is lovely :)
Would definitely recommend!
The prices are reasonable and the atmosphere is nice. The staff are especially friendly.

We went here for lunch today for two!
We drank beer and ordered smoothies, and the total came to about 1800 yen.
The food was delicious and the interior was clean!
The staff were also kind and nice♪
I recommend this place to all Japanese tourists😊

I stumbled on this restaurant while googling what is nearby  and I'm so glad we tried this place.  It's a beautiful cosy restaurant,  with excellent staff service. Truly appreciate Thinh who spent time speaking with us.
We ordered the tiger prawn, spring roll seafood, a veg and an egg. The servings were generous and food is delicious and reasonably priced.
The salted coffee and detox juice were good also.
My only regret is that I found this place on my last night in Danang. If I can,  I would love to come again.

we had a great time there in the afternoon for the late lunch,both food and service are very good,avocado smoothies are fresh and nice. especially thanks to Rim, very considerate and with passion & hospitality :)

I walked past the restaurant next to my hotel without searching, and it was the best I've had in Vietnam. The name "Kim" suggests it's run by a Korean, but I'm not. It's a great feeling to find a local restaurant. I highly recommend this place.
The restaurant is centrally located, spacious and clean. The staff is quick and enthusiastic. The food is impeccable, delicious and reasonably priced. Will come back again.

The restaurant has a light decor,
The food is delicious
I have eaten here many times, I really like the snail noodle soup and mango smoothie

This is truly one of the restaurants that I am most impressed and interested in, not only the beautiful space, delicious food, beautifully decorated, attractive and the staff are friendly and enthusiastic.

The restaurant right in the city center has a cool and relaxing green space.
I came to experience it after reading reviews from previous guests and indeed the food and service here did not disappoint me.
hightly recommend !
Have been to the restaurant many times with friends. Delicious food, tasty spices, clean, airy and cute space
Clean, cozy space, ideal place to meet friends and colleagues. Delicious food and drinks, beautifully presented. Friendly, lovely staff, speaking good English

I visited this place at the end of my month-long stay in Vietnam.
I'd been obsessed with banh xeo for a month, eating it in so many places, and it was all delicious.
But the banh xeo here, as soon as I took a bite, filled my mouth with an unbelievable, porky smell. It wasn't just a smell, it was a rotten smell.

I asked the man who seemed to be the manager if this was normal, but he said it was the traditional flavor and that it was normal.
I couldn't believe that this was the traditional flavor I hadn't tasted anywhere in a month.

Banh xeo is usually only available for lunch, but since I visited late in the morning, I asked if it was available. The manager confirmed with the kitchen and said it was available, so I ordered it.

I wondered if that was the problem. Maybe they substituted the meat that wasn't ready yet with whatever was left?

I ended up throwing the banh xeo away after just one bite.
Even after leaving the restaurant and finishing a mango smoothie at another cafe, the unpleasant, porky, rotten smell persisted. Even after another cup of coffee...
Phew... I finally went back to the hotel and brushed my teeth twice.

Judging by the lack of similar comments in other Korean reviews, there must have been something wrong with the banh xeo I had. The manager didn't even bother checking the food, just assumed it didn't suit a traveler's palate. It was disappointing.

Oh, the restaurant is clean and the staff are friendly.

This food suits the Korean palate well! It's delicious. The food comes out quickly, and I went alone, but the staff was friendly and nice.💗 It's not a well-known place yet, so it wasn't crowded, which was nice! Basically, they can communicate in English, and it seems that there are staff who can speak Japanese. It was clean, and they even provided a high chair for the baby at the table next to me.😊 My first meal after arriving in Da Nang was a success🙏 I had bun cha, cha gio, Tiger beer, and mango macchiato. It cost a little over 10,000 won. Very satisfied👍

This is a great restaurant near the Novotel. The interior is beautiful, and the food, coffee, and atmosphere are all satisfying. The staff are friendly and attentive. The bun cha, in particular, is the best I've had in Da Nang.

It's more delicious than many of the restaurants recommended by Korean cafes. The beautiful plating was also a feast for the eyes. I discovered it when I was returning to Korea, but I only visited twice, which is a shame. Manager Thinh and the other staff were so friendly, and the mango drink was the best I've ever had!

The prices are also reasonable.
Every food is delicious and look very good. Good service good food. Staff Thinh service is amazing good.
A restaurant with the best price, atmosphere, and taste... I went there two days in a row the day before I left!
Ok, ideally sit in a cool place

I was looking to see if there was a restaurant open early in the morning, so I went there because the reviews were great and the interior was cute. It was the best restaurant during my trip to Da Nang. It was so delicious that I went there twice. It was cheap and all the food was delicious. There were some ants walking around, but that wasn't a problem.
Super nice restaurant with extremely polite service. Great food. Attentive waiters. Beautiful interior.
The restaurant is clean, the staff is enthusiastic, the food is quite delicious, the vermicelli noodles and pho taste nothing special.
We enjoyed a delicious lunch and were hosted amazingly by Thin. thank you very much!
Food is nice. Good atmosphere and service.

The food is yummy! We like the restaurant atmosphere, and the decoration. The lemongrass pork skewer is tender and juicy.
The waiters are all attentive and always around to serve the customers, especially Thinh.
A lovely restaurant with excellent vietnemese cuisine. Thinh is a great host too, very welcoming and service with a smile
Very nice little restaurant! I had shrimp curry and it was really good. They also offer special teas. The flower tea was delicious! The staff was super friendly and helpful! Thank you.
The food is scrumptious. With friendly and accommodating staffs. The ambiance is very relaxing with soothing  background music. I highly recommend this place.🤗

This is a delicious restaurant near Bay Capital Danang. Please go there... It's cheap and delicious.
They sell different breakfast and lunch menus.
I had breakfast and it was so delicious that I ate lunch the next day.
If you choose the recommended food and eat it, it's definitely delicious.
I thought there would be a spicy smell because there were only locals, but it wasn't and it was delicious👍👍
For drinks, I tried coconut coffee, mango smoothie, and Americano, and they were all delicious.
They cut and grind the fruit right there.
You don't have to go to Kong Cafe. It's even more delicious.
If I hadn't gone to Hoi An, I think I would have eaten dinner here too.

As a couple travelling through Vietnam we landend in Kim Restaurant because it looked very cosy and had good ratings on Google. We were not disappointed. The food was excellent and the staff was extremly friendly and attentiv. We would definitly come again and can recommend the restaurant to everyone.
I used it for breakfast. It was clean and relaxing. The staff were nice. The coffee was delicious, so I bought some coffee beans as a souvenir.
Small, cute restaurant. Delicious food, goes well with rice. Reasonable price
‼️ the kitchens close at 9:00 p.m., so don't come too late if you want to eat

It is very chill coffee and food place.
They made the food based on their local style, which is quite salty and spicy. So if you hate it, just tell them next time to bland it (I always ask half normal).

Their lunch combo is 109k, approx 5usd.
Also their breakfast food is very tasty.
The staff are very friendly, enthusiastic service, delicious food. It is a suitable place for the weekend to enjoy with family!
It's delicious. The price is reasonable and it's served cleanly.
The food and drinks are delicious, to my taste, the space is quiet, elegant, the price is reasonable, I will support the restaurant more 🥰

I have probably had meals here at least 4 times, I am really satisfied with the food here, the taste helps me reminisce about family meals because I am a person working far away from home, the space is intimate, airy, the staff is enthusiastic when serving, the location is very suitable for families or groups, I will definitely come back next time ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Wow, this place is great. I love the decor, great ambiance. Tables are spaced out so you can enjoy some privacy. Food was delicious and beautiful. I met the owner who was very friendly. Will be back next time I’m in da nang.  Thank you!

We had a lovely time at Kim restaurantwith my partner. The place was so peaceful, perfect for date night with lofi music and delicious food. The service was amazing, the staff was very attentive and helped with the menu if you had any questions. The prices are also very reasonable, definitely a hidden gem in the city ✨️

I wanted to like this place, unfortunately it fell flat. The drinks are overpriced and watered down. Food was just average. Many menu items were not available and the ones we did get did not match the picture whatsoever. The pancakes were pretty good  but I've had much better.

The food is absolutely delicious~^^
The staff is friendly too~ I stopped by because it's next to my hotel,
and I think I'll be back tomorrow~
If I had to recommend a menu item... I had six, and they were all delicious.
Try it! You won't regret it!

It was very reasonably priced and delicious.
The store was clean and the staff were friendly and had lovely smiles.
really nice authentic food for a decent price. the staff was super friendly :)
red
Had an amazing dinner here and prices were great. Food was really tasty with lots of variety. I really liked the fresh fish spring rolls the most. Would recommend coming!
The foods was really good, it's an authentic Vietnamese dishes and the staff are friendly. The ambiance is also nice felt like I'm really eating home cooked meals. We keep coming back actually ❤️❤️❤️
Delicious food ❤️
Food is delicious. The staff is ok, there is a cute and cheerful girl.
Quiet space, delicious food will come back again!

Sometimes I hesitate to stop at an unfamiliar restaurant, but the bright and spacious atmosphere drew me in despite myself.  Which was a stroke of luck, as the owner is friendly and the fish soup marvelous.
Delicious food, fantastic coffee, great service!

On the way back to hotel, I found this restaurant and had lunch here. The food and atmosphere was really nice. Moreover, the staff were very kind, especially Thu, she kindly teach me how to eat ban xeo:) thank you!
Beautiful restaurant, delicious food, reasonable price
Delicious and cheap
Delicious food, cute service etc.
Because there were a lot of customers, the food was served slowly. The food was to my taste.
Delicious food to suit your taste
The restaurant cooks well, reasonable prices, airy. Service needs to be much faster.
The food is a bit salty.
Delicious food, very freiendly service, beautiful place. Kim Restaurant is a real treat! 😊
Nice atmosphere, clean and cozy, polite staff, delicious food. We ordered fried rice with shrimp paste and fried beef separately. For dessert there was a mango cocktail, which I especially liked.
The menu has a variety of dishes, but the prices are cheap, the space is quiet, the view is beautiful, especially the food and drinks are delicious and suitable for the taste.
• It's really delicious and I love it❤️
A great place for coffee and breakfast. Delicious food, super relaxing space. Highly Recommend.
Everything is clean and neat. The food tastes and looks good. Affordable prices for ordering and eating a variety of foods. Kindness.
Very nice restaurants. Food is good. And price is much lower than on the touristy side of Da Nang. Recommended.
It was reasonably priced and the atmosphere was very nice. The spring rolls were delicious~

Our guide recommended us this Restaurant and we loved it! The food was amazing & the service is 12/10 - the people care about serving you well and so kind!

If you come to da nang, go to this Restaurant. :) we will come back next year 😊

Because it was delicious, I came here a second time and the service was equally friendly and courteous.
The food is delicious. I really like it!
The restaurant is a great experience both in terms of cuisine and cozy, intimate, romantic space. Delicious food, reasonable prices, friendly and attentive service. 10/10 points
Really good authentic food and great service. Highly recommended!
The food was pretty good. Better than most similar Vietnamese restaurants I have been to. The decor is bright and the restaurant is clean and neat. Good for family with kids.
The food is pretty good, and  I am very enjoying eating here!
Fantastic restaurant, great food, very friendly staff, & very pleasant atmosphere
Great food & great service

Great food, service, and atmosphere. Loved every little details of this restaurant. The servers offer great service, lots of attention to detail. The food is also great and presented very nicely. The salt coffee and their teas are also very very good! Would come back again!

Reviewer_name: Adri Esparza El que viste y calza
Review_text: Clean and nice restaurant, delicious food, local cuisine the one that your grandma would  cook if she were Vietnamese 😊
The fried fish spring rolls are super delicious, and the fried rice grains are distinct.
The restaurant makes delicious food, suitable for taste, reasonable prices, clean and airy space and dedicated service staff. I have eaten here a few times and I think the restaurant is very good.

I'm so satisfied that I'm writing a review even though I wasn't asked to! My mom said I absolutely had to tell her about this place. ㅎㅎㅎ It's right near the Bay Capital Hotel. The store is clean, the staff is really friendly, and most of all, the food is delicious. I was so satisfied with lunch on my last day that I'm going to have dinner and catch an overnight flight! If you're around here, definitely stop by.

At Kim Coffee and Restaurant in Da Nang City, the ambiance is delightful, with charming decor that elevates the dining experience.  The beef stew itself is a masterpiece – tender, succulent meat immersed in a hearty blend of spices, creating a symphony of flavors that leaves a lasting impression. This spot seamlessly combines tasteful aesthetics with a culinary adventure, making it a must-visit in Da Nang. Very good price too and attentive service.

There were some good restaurants nearby, but the dish I had in my hand was the best!! You have to try it!! The staff are really friendly and the food is delicious. This is my first review, but it was really delicious, so I'm writing this. It's much more delicious than the restaurants in the area. My review is true. There are many bad restaurants in places that claim to be good restaurants, but this place is a good restaurant.
I tried mostly foods I had never tried before in Korea, and I was surprised that they suited my taste better than I expected. ^^
This place was so fab. Stopped for some lunch and had a range of incredible dishes. Highly recommend Kim !!
This is the best place that we found in Da nang. Love it so much. Came here for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Very tasty food and juices. Staff is very responsive and nice. Great Vietnamese coffee.

So elegant and high quality
This is my first time trying Vietnamese food.
The quality of the herbs is also great.
Very tasty food and coffee, great prices.
Delicious food, relaxing and gentle space. Attentive service staff!!!
The shop is clean and cool. Relaxing space. The food is beautiful, but a bit bland for Southern tastes like me. The braised fish sauce is top notch.
The food was so delicious and clean that I came here twice. The price was also good.
Excellent restaurant, great staff great service, I tried the stir fry beef with mushrooms and spring rolls both delicious. Excellent value for money
Delicious food, friendly staff

Delicious food, I really like the space. Although the sign is a restaurant, the price is very cheap. The staff is very friendly. I like the owner the most, she takes care of my family very much. I will recommend to friends and will come to the restaurant again.
Great place to relax

Nice place, delicious food.
i have nice experien here. I will come back. Thanks,
The best Vietnamese food I had so far! Very enthusiastic and welcoming staff. Also, there is quite reasonable food pricing.

My mistake was not asking the price before ordering, but the restaurant should put all the dishes on the menu.
A hot pot of 1 piece of cobia fish for 280k is unacceptable.
There will not be a next time, and I will not introduce acquaintances here.
The restaurant has delicious food, good prices, spacious, airy, clean space, enthusiastic and cheerful staff and owner.
Comfortable place to eat ,traditional Vietnam food ,nice view ,good service ,eat 3time at this trip ,nearby bay capital hotel .
Salt coffee is the best^^ Noodle soup is a matter of taste~

We really enjoyed our dinner tonight. All the food and drinks were delicious, beautifully presented, and the colors of the tableware were very appetizing. The curry was a bit spicy for foreign tourists, but overall the food was delicious. We are so lucky to have such delicious food on the last day of this year.

I stayed at Bay Capital and then stopped by before heading to the airport on my last day...
It's only a 1-minute walk from my accommodation, but I regret not finding this place until the last minute...ㅠㅠㅠ
The home-cooked meals are delicious and the prices seem to be the cheapest in Da Nang. If you order rice, they serve it with scorched rice.
nice environment delicious food!
Nice place, food & service!

They offer a great variety of typical Da Nang dishes like Mi quang and classic Vietnamese vegetarian and meat dishes/soups. 😋Also a lot of juices, coffee to choose etc The staff and service was very kind and helpful. The atmosphere is super nice and everything is clean👌🏻
It's friendly and delicious. It's clean and nice. I like the mango macchiano, so I came again.
Ideal place. The noodle soup is very tasty, excellent spring rolls. great service. I recommend

I have been to the restaurant many times and I have never been disappointed with the quality of the food here!
I will be back many times!😘
A wonderful place. We had rolls, stewed bass, and soup—unbelievably delicious! The girls were very sweet and welcoming. The restaurant's prices are like a cafe's, so we were shocked when we paid.

We traveled to Da Nang and enjoyed everything here. Very tasty food and perfect service. Red is a very kind and friendly staff here and she recommended such delicious food to us. Snail roll is a must try!
This place is delicious, great service and nice prices. Love it 😻

What I liked the most during my trip to Da Nang
Vietnamese restaurant. Flying is pretty and kind.
The interior was also nice. May you prosper~~~^^
Clean and delicious Vietnamese food, friendly staff, and a bright and clean interior. If you're nearby, I highly recommend stopping by. ^^

I'm satisfied with both the price and the food.

A lovely restaurant.

The shrimp and pork rolls are delicious.

The food is presented beautifully.

You should also try the snail roll.

The staff is also very friendly.
A small restaurant near the hotel. Beautiful decor 🎄. Friendly staff. Great for photos. Affordable drinks. Perfect for an afternoon out with family and friends 💕
The avocado ice cream is really good. I regret not finding out about it until the last day.
Delicious, and the price is also reasonable. Staffs were very nice

I have been to the restaurant 4-5 times, every time the staff is enthusiastic, cute, and friendly. The restaurant space is airy, beautifully decorated. Regarding the food, I find the snail rolls, vermicelli with grilled pork, and pork belly very suitable for my taste, and the other dishes and drinks are also very delicious and affordable. Overall, I rate it 9.5/10.
Good food and nice experience, I love the music and atmosphere here. Highly recommended.

The menu is in English and serves a variety of local as well other asian types of food. The food is tasty and very affordable. Would recommend the Tiger Prawn curry (didnt get a photo of it) as well as their detox juices. The staff is very friendly and helpful. If you’re in town, make sure you stop here for breakfast, lunch or dinner.
Accidentally stopped by once and had to come back many times. This restaurant has delicious food, a gentle and polite space. The staff are very cute. 10 points

Very nice
Delicious food and drinks
Chill space …

The newly opened restaurant is very beautiful, everyone.
The food is well-seasoned, the decor is neat and clean.
The staff is very friendly, the young and dynamic people keep asking and taking …

The menu has a variety of dishes, but the prices are cheap, especially the Kim's Oc Cha dish is very delicious. The restaurant space is beautifully decorated, the inside is cozy, very suitable for this winter weather.
Delicious food, attentive and enthusiastic staff. Comfortable space suitable for family gatherings.

Chicken hotpot with sour leaves 196k, probably 200g diced chicken and 1 piece of white tofu cut into 8 pieces and a plate of noodles for 1 person. The hotpot broth was bland, not rich in flavor. I probably won't dare to come here again.
There aren't many restaurants around the hotel, but this one is the best. The hotel is expensive.
Walked by and decided to stop for lunch. Really cute atmosphere, and the server Red was very knowledgeable about the menu. Had pork belly, boi choy, and mushrooms. All were delicious!

I came here for lunch near the hotel.
The food is neat, tasty, and the atmosphere is nice.
The space is comfortable too …

The second time I came to Da Nang, I found this restaurant next to the hotel. It is not too big but the place is clean and tidy. The waiters are enthusiastic and the store manager Grace is very smiling. The food is very high-quality. The most surprising thing is that the price is not expensive at all. It deserves a thumbs up. I will definitely come back next time.
First of all, they're friendly. The cocoa coffee is delicious. It's hard for kids to evaluate the taste because they only had a shot of juice. Haha. I'd definitely visit again.

The food is very clean, luxurious, and fine dining, but it's cheap~ The drinks are delicious, and the coffee is delicious! The photos are pretty too
The store is clean, and everyone is friendly!
It's worth a visit even if you don't stay nearby~~
the food's delicious 😍
The rice is delicious, the dishes are diverse, the restaurant is clean and very nice and the owner is friendly
I came here because it was near the hotel, and it was so clean and friendly. I heard it's only been open for 2 months, but the staff speak English very well. I recommend it❣️

This restaurant is very good, the atmosphere is clean and quiet, the waiters are helpful, the dishes are delicious and cheap. My group of tourists and I are very satisfied and will come again next time.
Professional service

Delicious traditional Vietnamese dishes.
Kind, enthusiastic service.
Bright, clean, modernized space.
Delicious food

I loved having a clean and cozy restaurant near my hotel!
The Nemrui garnish was especially delicious, with its lemongrass flavor (highly recommended). My son loved the mango latte, so we had two.
The restaurant's atmosphere, food, and friendly staff were all wonderful, so I definitely want to visit again next time I'm in Da Nang!
I'm eagerly recommending it to friends who are planning to visit Da Nang after returning to Korea. ^^
Delicious food, airy, elegant space, lovely, enthusiastic staff, will visit often
Great experience
Old neighbors met after a long time - so happy, and chose a great meeting place: delicious food, cheap price, beautiful space, extremely cute owner.
Great place to eat and hang out with friends. Beautiful space, delicious food, beautiful and enthusiastic hostess.
Coming back to the restaurant for the second time, I still like the service and food, the restaurant space is great, I will recommend it to many friends.
The shop has beautiful decor 😍 delicious food and drinks. Order a cup of silver coffee, both rich and fragrant with coffee aroma.

I visited the restaurant for breakfast and morning coffee. The space here is cozy, beautifully decorated and clean. The location is right in the city center, the menu is rich. The dishes have a strong Vietnamese flavor, rich. Reasonable prices (drinks have very cheap dishes compared to my feelings). The food and drinks are very delicious. 
📌The special impression of the restaurant is the attentive service staff, greeting and taking care of customers from the entrance. 
1 vote for the restaurant, will support enthusiastically ❤️. 
📍37 Quang Trung

A newly opened, lovely restaurant with a luxurious style but affordable prices. The restaurant serves breakfast with a diverse menu and delicious coffee. Everyone should enjoy the extremely delicious snail rolls for lunch. 
Cars can be parked on both sides of the street. If there is no more space, go to the city's administrative center parking lot, only about 100 meters from the restaurant, free of charge. 
The restaurant should add some dipping sauces to diversify and suit many tastes and dishes.
Delicious food, beautiful restaurant with affordable prices, enthusiastic service. Will come back next time!
Delicious food, Chil view, ok space!
The food is delicious, the price is reasonable

Beautiful restaurant, green space. Every corner is extremely clean and neat.
Food: especially Hanoi bun cha and salads are excellent.
A place to come back many times.
Very satisfied ❤️
The vermicelli here is very delicious, the broth is the star of the dish and the price is reasonable. But the ribs need to be a little soft. Will stop by again. Recommend everyone to try it
Delicious drinks

Had Nha Kim snail sausage, crispy fried fish rolls, burnt pork belly. Delicious, good taste.
Quiet, clean, luxurious space.
Will come back. 5*

Delicious
Highly recommendddd

The food is delicious, the drinks are great 👌✋

Please reach out to me and my company if you'd like to get more customers and grow your revenues by investing in staff training and high level hospitality customer service.

I recently had the pleasure of attending a SecretEATS dinner in Da Nang, hosted by the incredibly talented Chef Nguyen and his gracious wife, Tracy, of City High Dining. From start to finish, the experience was nothing short of magical.

The journey to the venue was an adventure in itself. We were dropped off at a dimly lit alley, where we navigated puddles and uneven ground, all adding to the excitement and mystery. Climbing an unbelievably steep flight of stairs to the venue further heightened the anticipation. At the top, we were warmly welcomed by Tracy’s radiant smile and stepped into a beautifully lit dining room that felt like it was reserved just for us. The ambiance was intimate yet relaxed, with candles, crisp napkins, and elegantly set tables that promised a special evening without feeling overly formal.

The multi-course menu was a testament to Chef Nguyen’s artistry and creativity. Each dish was thoughtfully crafted with fresh, local ingredients and presented with flair. While Chef Nguyen didn’t personally introduce the dishes, it was clear that his expertise and vision were infused into every element of the meal. The team’s professionalism and warmth in explaining each course made us feel equally valued and connected to the culinary journey.

What we loved most was the air of mystery that surrounded the evening. The secret location and unknown menu made every moment a delightful surprise. Chef Nguyen and his wife’s passion and attention to detail transformed what could have been just another dinner into a memorable journey of flavors, culture, and warm hospitality.

When Tracy asked for feedback at the end of the evening, my only comment was that I wished it could have lasted longer. Perhaps it felt too short simply because we were having such a wonderful time enjoying the food, wine, and engaging conversation.

What made this evening even more remarkable was how it compared to two other notable meals we had during our trip—visits to Michelin-starred restaurants in the city. On the way back to our hotel and even during our flight home, we unanimously agreed that SecretEATS at City High Dining edged out the Michelin-starred experiences. Both the food and the atmosphere at City High Dining were simply superior—a true testament to the passion and dedication of Chef Nguyen and Tracy.

City High Dining truly brought the SecretEATS concept to life in one of the best ways we’ve ever experienced. I’m already planning my next visit to see how Nguyen and Tracy continue to push boundaries and make the experience even better. To Chef Nguyen, Tracy, and the entire team at City High Dining—bravo and well done!

A Culinary Adventure at City High

City High offers a truly unique and unforgettable dining experience. The moment you step inside, you're greeted by a super elegant atmosphere that sets the stage for a memorable meal.

From the delightful local-inspired appetizers to the exquisite scallops and perfectly cooked lamb racks, each dish is a masterpiece. The refreshing basil sorbet cleanses the palate, and the dessert of Bailey's and Milo macaroons with tamarind paste and English tea is a delightful finale.

It's a truly exceptional experience that you won't find easily elsewhere. The fact that this level of culinary sophistication is available in a small valley within Da Nang City is even more impressive.

What an amazing find. Could not fault the food, nor the service. Each dish that came out was clearly designed to offer a food lovers experience. Just when you think it can’t get any better, it does! Run by Tracy, front of house and her husband as the head chef. What a team.  It’s a hidden gem. Can’t wait to come back.

Found by chance thanks to the positive reviews, City High is like its location:
Slightly hidden from the hustle and bustle of the city, it creates a mismatch and a wait as soon as you arrive at the entrance.
Polite, smiling, and attentive service.
A simple but coherent menu with a clear concept. Fair prices and the desire to return soon, if only it weren't so far from Europe!
P.S. Excellent cocktails!
Delicious food and very enthusiastic staff

I just found out about this place in Danang~~ It's better than the hotel restaurant. The steak is the best I've had in Danang, and the truffle risotto is definitely recommended. I'd definitely visit again. 100000000%

A hidden restaurant deep in an alley. Quite surprised with the logo 🤪 it's very classy... as soon as I step into the restaurant I can smell the food :)... the food is okay... not good or bad... but still can't reach the fine dining level. The combination of ingredients is also ok.. not wow but the plus point is the ok decoration... the price is a bit overpriced for what is received... Service is okay... the enthusiastic staff :D will probably give the restaurant another chance next time...

Tucked away down a tiny Laneway this restaurant is Da Nang gem. Every dish  was absolutely delicious and presentation was beautiful and the service was second to none with all staff members very attentive. Every item on the menu sounded delicious along with a drinks menu to match. This cost little restaurant was a highlight of our stay in Da Nang, worth every dong,, would highly recommend.
You can observe the level of dedication and love they put into their work in the result. I’ll repeat, again! 😉 …

The restaurant is located in a small alley. It is a completely different world once you enter. The retro decoration is matched with dim lights, beautiful music, candles and roses, which is very suitable for celebrating special holidays🥰. This time I came to Da Nang and chose this restaurant on Google Map to celebrate Valentine's Day. The food and atmosphere are very satisfactory. Each dish has different characteristics. The most amazing thing is the truffle chocolate French toast, which is really special and delicious! Recommend everyone to come to Da Nang to try it🤩
Great steak, even better fresh bread for entree. Amazing quiet spot and the service was brilliant. Recommend!

My wife and I recently had what can only be described as the most underwhelming "fine dining" experience of our lives. The meal, advertised as a unique and special experience, fell far short of our expectations.

The evening began at 8 p.m. with a reservation in a nearly empty restaurant. We were uncertain about what to expect regarding the food and service, both of which turned out to be disappointingly subpar.

Our server team, despite their friendly demeanor, struggled with their English, which hindered communication as our dissatisfaction grew. The meal seemed more suited for social media appeal than actual dining enjoyment.

Our dinner commenced with an attractive yet tasteless garlic bread-like roll. Its presentation was photogenic, but it was dry and unappetizing on the inside.

A lengthy wait preceded the second course, accompanied by a mediocre sparkling wine. The servers' sweet efforts to describe the wine in broken English only delayed us from eating our rapidly cooling food. The meal's pacing was consistently off.

Throughout dinner, used utensils and glassware cluttered our table until we specifically asked for them to be cleared. This lack of attention was surprising for a restaurant claiming to offer a fine dining experience.

The second course featured artistically presented, but bland and poorly textured tiny shrimps.

Each course's utensils were brought after the dish was served, reflecting a lack of professionalism.

The third course, an egg-yolk ravioli, was the only decent item, though it was served cold.

A baffling moment occurred when a server showcased an attractive bun, purportedly Beef Wellington, only to inform us it needed another 15 minutes of cooking. It was odd to be presented with an unready dish.

Even worse, my vegetarian wife received a fish dish so unpalatable that she barely tasted it.

The wine pairings ranged from unremarkable to downright awful. When the Beef Wellington finally arrived, it was tough and stringy, a far cry from the Wagyu beef they claimed it to be. Inadequately equipped with only a standard dinner knife, I struggled to cut through the meat, causing its components to fall apart.

Dessert didn't improve matters, consisting of a mediocre assortment including a tart, a mushy macaron, a cookie, and a sugary gummy shaped like a marijuana leaf, reminiscent of children's candy. Most dishes seemed designed more for photography than for eating.

Despite claims of high-quality ingredients, the dishes, such as the mealy "caviar," suggested otherwise. We left the restaurant early, deeply disappointed.

On our ride home, we read reviews warning of the owner threatening locals for negative feedback. We're not from Vietnam, but we feel compelled to caution potential diners: this establishment delivers poor food, unprofessional service, and overall disappointment at a steep price.

If the owner resorts to intimidation over honest reviews, this should be reported to the authorities. We were promised a unique dining experience, and it certainly was unique - just not in the way it was intended.

Do not dine here!!

*********
Editing my review to respond to the baffling and false assertions by the “management” of this weird and terrible restaurant:

How disturbing that you refer to watching us (or this other person and his wife Helen) on CCTV.  I imagine this is just another falsehood.

It's clear that you spend more time trying to rescue your reputation than establish it.

*** Updated one more time to add that after two weeks, we did receive a full refund.  The rest of my review stands as a true reflection of our experience.
I came here on Christmas and had the special set menu. The restaurant uses very valuable ingredients, beautifully presented and delicious. It took about 2-2.5 hours to complete the experience.

I just want to let you know. Of all the meals I enjoyed in Da Nang, this was the best. I visited on International Women's Day and it was truly an unforgettable experience. I was impressed by the picturesque plating and excellent service. Thank you for a wonderful time.
A great find, passionate couple with very delicate and original cooking. Impressive quality and attention to details! Loved it.

First impressions are everything. We were suprised that the restaurant is in a small aley but it gave us a wonderful experience. I have to say this was one of the best dining experiences I have had in Danang. The service was top-notch; the staff were helpful, explained each dish thoroughly, and were extremely professional

We were amazed by the atmosphere, the friendliness of the staff, the quality and presentation of dishes were divine. The place is very cozy and intimate. Beautiful architecture with open kitchen. Especially impressed with the chef, he works with all passion. You can feell all of their passion in each menu they prepared, the way they care for small things.

Food was absolutely fantastic and we were totally blown away. You could see so much thought had gone into every dish. Fresh and fragrant ingredients, full of flavour and refinement. We tried the foie gras, the flavor is married together and really stunning. Then the seasonal fish delivered mouthwatering satisfaction with tenderness and soft texture. The desserts were perfect enough with 3 main ingredients : basil, wild honey, lemon zest brought the perfect combination. Great wine list with fair pricing.

Such a memorable night in an enchanting atmosphere. Looking forward to go there again soon !

We tried seasonal set menu with wine pairing last night and it was amazing. We love how they presented each course in detail. The tastes were so complex and technically executed. The ingredients were used to perfection and the technique was exquisite. The orgarnic duck was my favourite. A good mix of flavors yet does not overpower the main ingredients. The menu changes every 3 months, so you'll always get something exciting and new. Their wine pairing was so good and their staff was professional, knowledgeable and hospitable. I love the setting in City high Dining and also the music. Highly recommend this restaurant for a nice night out with friends, family, or a romantic date. Price very reasonable for the quality of food! Worth visit. We will definitely come back again.

We went to this restaurant and were shocked 1) Location - Walk through a meter wide dirty ally to get to the place 2) very poor service 3) most items on Menu unavailable- reason they stated was that they had been very busy... could not see another soul here.  4) Food was cold and it seems they ordered from outside and served us the same 5) super expensive.
I would avoid this place at all costs. Its a total Con of a restaurant. This place does not even deserve a one star!

I was plan to have some street food for dinner but the stall moved to the new location. So my boyfriend took me to this restaurant- City High dinning.
Food was nice and good service, we have warming welcome by the owner lady and chef. And the plus that a young lady food runner explain to us how they make it and what they add-in. Serve with passion.
It such a good place for dating or propose. I hope more friends of mine can come and try.

Sending positive vibes💙

As expected, I was surprised that the lamb and chicken were really delicious in Vietnam. I especially recommend the lamb ribs here, and the atmosphere was like a dining experience in Vietnam for the first time.

But when they asked me to tell them the name of the fish, it was a bit absurd to ask them to search and find out on their own haha.

Good service, quiet space I really like, a plus point is that the dishes here are all-inclusive, no extra charge. Food of course depends on taste, I personally like wonton (can't remember the name) because of the interesting texture and flavor of that dish, and mushroom rice (can't remember the specific name either 😭) with risotto sauce is a bit normal, nothing special, lacks highlights for me personally. The number of dishes is a bit small to choose from. Oh, the portion is quite a lot, I ate 2 plates by myself and was so full I was breathless 😂 this meal cost about more than 500k, the price is quite okay

Our recent visit to City High Dining, where we celebrated a friend's birthday, was nothing short of exceptional. The staff's warm hospitality and the beautifully presented, delicious dishes crafted by talented chefs exceeded our expectations. What truly elevated the experience was the excellent wine pairing and cheese selection recommended by the knowledgeable staff. As a delightful surprise, they even treated us to an extra dessert for our friend's special day. City High Dining offers excellent value for money, and I wholeheartedly recommend this delightful culinary and wine experience.
Cozy space, delicious food, fine dining!
Well crafted dinner menu with carefully selected ingredients. Very courteous and prompt service.

Oh my gosh, I can't believe it, in a small alley in the heart of Da Nang, there is a restaurant like this. I don't know about other guests, but I personally give it 9.5/10 VND, the restaurant space alone is enough to make me fall in love, and talking about the food, there's no need to discuss, not only the quality but also the price is reasonable compared to many places I've been to, the service is also very good, if you have the opportunity to come to Da Nang and want to enjoy European-style dishes, try to stop by and experience it! (The kitchen staff is also very handsome 😁)

An experience worth trying, the space feels cozy and the friendly staff enthusiastically guides us to easily enjoy. The dishes are meticulously prepared, the flavors are explosive, making us fully enjoy the dish. Next time if I have the opportunity to return to Da Nang, I will visit the restaurant many times.

The food is amazing, Dining restaurant with reasonable prices, cheaper than the average.
Professional staff
The chef is also handsome 🌝
delicious food, quality set menu

The restaurant location is not convenient, it is quite deep in the alley, but the staff is enthusiastic. The food is not to my taste: the wagu beef is okay but it was cold when it was brought out, when I asked to reheat it it was a bit burnt. Honestly quite disappointed, the food is not worth the money spent.

Of course, my review section in every place I go from the service to the food, and most of all, the hygiene always makes me feel most comfortable when I arrive and most satisfied when I leave. The place I choose to review on the side I stop at is not wrong... Wish you always strong.

In a small alley (speekeasy style😍) Excellent food, efficient service, cozy and trendy with particularly perfect music! As I like👌🏼😍
We had a lovely time with my wife!
We will come back with pleasure!
Thanks to the whole team

Not bad, very good value for money A5 Miyazaki Wagyu 😎😎😎

￼One bottle of wine + two appetizers￼ + three main dishes (for three people)
= around 3,400,000 VND

Wow... there's a restaurant like this in Da Nang, Vietnam...?
I had a 4-course set menu, but the food was a bit spicy, so I never thought I could really eat it in Vietnam, whether in terms of taste or atmosphere. The appetizers were challenging and experimental, and the main menu was slightly spicy but really delicious. It was really nice that the dessert cherry dish was finished neatly at the end.
The manager explained everything from seating instructions to food explanations in English since he was a foreigner, but he was very fluent and kind. I could tell the class of this restaurant by the way they were careful and quiet when arranging the cutlery for each course.
I can't believe I can get this kind of food at this price.. It's really cool.

And it was difficult to find the entrance... Go to the end of the alley where there is a round "CITY HIGH" sign and turn right. Google Maps doesn't show today's alley, but people can pass by. There is a building with yellow lights at the end. You can go there! Because it was evening, I was scared, so I was wandering around looking for it, and a resident there recognized me and told me the location.
I recommend it for its value for money. There are many places in Gangnam that serve this kind of delicious food, but this is a restaurant I highly recommend in Da Nang.
We miss this restaurant. One of the best in Danang..  Fine dining. Unique location in an alley.  Great pricing.
Delicious food, beautiful space, funny owner

I’m upset because the food in restaurant is so delicious. It's like in the movie "Ratatouille”. meat is soft and the sauce is very good.

Luxurious restaurant, dishes served quite quickly. Suitable for my taste. Cozy family meal. Will come back

A true Gem in the city. It's a place where passion and love for culinary  transcends over monetary gains. The place have limted seatings so the Chef can control the quality and service!. Kudos! One of the best meals we had in the city!
I ordered risotto and steak and was very satisfied. The risotto in particular had a special taste. It's not easy to find because you have to go into an alley, but it's worth a visit.
Amazing experience!

My wife booked reservation online and got a quick reply from the manager. Steak is delicious and made exactly like I order. The price is acceptable.
This restaurant located in backstreet so it is little hard to find but it worths the try. Highly recommend for western food lovers

A restaurant for you to visit and enjoy the culinary quintessence. With only 4 tables, 3 for couples and 1 for groups, the owner of this restaurant seems to want to focus on the quality of the food and not let too many customers distract him. From the quality of the food, the form of the decor, the way the ingredients are combined to create the best dishes. I have been there many times and have never been disappointed.
great. million Likes 👍👍👍👍 …
Beautiful restaurant, delicious food, very chill place suitable for dates. Enthusiastic staff, extremely funny and friendly owner. Highly recommended.

Amazing! Highly recommend for true food lovers! They don't sell steaks made from frozen meat here, so it's great... I hope Chef Luan imports more beef because it's so hard to keep track of what to eat, it's always out! 5 stars without thinking!
Delicious food, reasonable prices, clean space, very enthusiastic and attentive staff. Highly recommended to everyone!

delicious foods and nice view, must try 🥰 …

Experienced chef, cozy atmosphere, friendly staffs, all types of tasteful & juicy dishes. You will not find any better place to enjoy great food with reasonable prices. Highly recommend for tourists, couple who enjoy a quiet evening, friendly groups, and food enthusiasts.

Very impressed with the way the restaurant chef arranges the dishes on the plate.
Artistic, meticulous, neat.
The dishes are delicious, especially the beefsteak.
A must-visit place for steak and European food lovers in Da Nang.
delicious food :D
The food is delicious, especially the restaurant has a very romantic space. Will come back to support again.

The restaurant has an extremely warm and polite space. The dishes are very European-style with extremely beautiful decoration. This is the place I always choose for my important occasions to enjoy food with friends and relatives.
Small place but full of love. The food is delicious, must try.

Small, pretty, quiet space, funny owner, especially the food is extremely eye-catching and delicious but the price is reasonable,,, very suitable for couples or groups, really like and always support the restaurant every time visiting Da Nang.

Small, cozy restaurant suitable for couples to change the atmosphere. Super delicious food, colorful decor, worth experiencing.
just rude experience with management! Foreigners definitely should avoid this place

Great place. Everything was gorgeous. I will be back.

It wasn't that hard to find. There was a sign outside the alley. The price was a bit higher than the reviews. But it was delicious, the staff was friendly, and the chef was passionate. All the menus were good without fail. The red wine sauce was delicious, and the red wine was delicious. The avocado shrimp salad cut through the greasiness of the other menus. The atmosphere of the restaurant was also good. Now that I know about this place, I plan to visit often.

It is in a small alley.  Hard to find, but full of suprise.  Food quality is awesome.   I will definitely come again and again.  I hope you can come try these cuisines to keep it running on this difdicult time.
Danang best kept little secret..Awesome great food and services. Right behind min trahn apt and hotel in the laneway.

Excellent food quality, best hidden gem place for dating with affordable price. The owner is also the chef, respect what he did with this restaurant. A little bit difficult for reaching the restaurant, but it worths.
The other menu items are also delicious, but I always order smoked duck as my main dish.It's one of my favorite dishes😍Today's daily dessert was lamb raisin☆ …

I went to have dinner with my daughter. It's a small restaurant in a back alley, so it's like a "hideaway". I had the Roasted Duck, which was delicious. My daughter had the beef steak. The prices are also very reasonable and easy on the wallet.
cozy space. good food and good service.  Thank you for giving me a great evening
Light space, delicious and eye-catching food
Small, beautiful, romantic space, great music. Good quality food.
Salmon Salad eaten at City High Restaurant. Fresh avocado and prunes combined with Norwegian salmon was delicious.
A simple and quiet space -

For my standards, it's very tasty and the atmosphere is just too good... I think my parents were disappointed because the portions were small haha. Now that I think about it, the 400 gram steak portion is less than other reviews... Why... It costs the same 350k... That's why I took off one star. But don't worry about it and just go. Because it's Daejon Taeng.... You can come out and have another meal.

What a hidden treasure quite central in Da Nang. The way to the restaurant is not so easy to find, but the search is worth it. We had steak and lamb at the highest level, in a small restaurant with seven tables. The service was accordingly good! Keep up the good work! How long do you think it will be an insider tip?
Best Stake House in Town!
